You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this.$B$BBring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

2318.objective: Find someone who can translate the paladin's journal.  The closest location that might have someone is Kargath, in the Badlands.

2338.name: Translating the Journal
2338.objective: Let Jarkal borrow the necklace.  In exchange, he will translate the journal for you.

2339.name: Find the Gems and Power Source
2339.objective: Recover all three gems and a power source for the necklace from Uldaman, and then bring them to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath.  Jarkal believes a power source might be found on the strongest construct present in Uldaman.$B$BFrom the journal, you know...$B* The ruby has been stashed in a barricaded Shadowforge area.$B* The topaz has been hidden in an urn in one of the Trogg areas, near some Alliance dwarves.$B* The sapphire has been claimed by Grimlok, the trogg leader.

2340.name: Deliver the Gems
2340.objective: Deliver the Necklace and Gem Salvage to Dran Droffers in Orgrimmar.

2341.name: Necklace Recovery, Take 3
2341.objective: Visit Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath to see if he was successful.

2342.name: Reclaimed Treasures
2342.objective: Get Patrick Garrett's family treasure from their family chest in the South Common Hall of Uldaman, and bring it to him in the Undercity.

2358.name: Horns of Nez'ra
2358.objective: Return the Horns of Nez'ra to Arantir's Shadow in Lakeshire.

2359.name: Klaven's Tower
2359.objective: Steal the Defias Tower Key, break into the Defias Tower and uncover the contents of the Duskwood Chest. Take whatever information you find back to Mathias Shaw in Stormwind. Read Kearnen's Journal to gain insight about the tower.

2360.name: Mathias and the Defias
2360.objective: Travel to Westfall and find Agent Kearnen for your debriefing.

2378.name: Find the Shattered Hand
2378.objective: Journey to Orgrimmar and speak with Shenthul at the Cleft of Shadow.$B$B$B$B

2379.name: Zando'zan
2379.objective: Speak with Zando'zan at the Cleft of Shadow.

2380.name: To Orgrimmar!
2380.objective: Speak with Shenthul at the Cleft of Shadow in Orgrimmar.

2381.name: Plundering the Plunderers
2381.objective: Bring the Southsea Treasure back to Wrenix the Wretched in Ratchet. Do not forget to get an E.C.A.C. and Thieves' Tools from Wrenix's Gizmotronic Apparatus. You will need both of these items to complete your mission.$B$BShould you be attacked by any unusually hostile parrots, use your E.C.A.C.!

2382.name: Wrenix of Ratchet
2382.objective: Travel to Ratchet and speak with Wrenix the Wretched.

2383.name: Simple Parchment
2383.objective: Read the Simple Parchment and speak to Frang in the Valley of Trials.

2418.name: Power Stones
2418.objective: Bring 8 Dentrium Power Stones and 8 An'Alleum Power Stones to Rigglefuzz in the Badlands.

2438.name: The Emerald Dreamcatcher
2438.objective: Bring the Emerald Dreamcatcher to Tallonkai Swiftroot in Dolanaar.

2439.name: The Platinum Discs
2439.objective: Take your reward voucher to Dinita Stonemantle in the Vault of Ironforge.

2440.name: The Platinum Discs
2440.objective: Take the reward voucher to Bena Winterhoof in Thunder Bluff.

2458.name: Deep Cover
2458.objective: Travel to the Venture Co. Tower, north of the Sludge Fen and contact the Shattered Hand's covert operative, Taskmaster Fizzule.$B$BWhen the tower is in sight, use the Flare Gun to signal your arrival to Taskmaster Fizzule. Fire off TWO flares, then approach Taskmaster Fizzule and perform the Shattered /Salute.$B$BThese actions must be performed in the correct order, as Fizzule will attack and terminate any person he does not recognize.

2459.name: Ferocitas the Dream Eater
2459.objective: Tallonkai Swiftroot in Dolanaar wants you to kill 7 Gnarlpine Mystics and find the Missing Jewel.

2460.name: The Shattered Salute
2460.objective: Perform the Shattered Salute on Shenthul.

2479.name: Hinott's Assistance
2479.objective: Travel to Tarren Mill in Hillsbrad Foothills and deliver the Sample of Zanzil's Mixture to Serge Hinott.$B$BTo get to Tarren Mill, take the Zeppelin to the Undercity and follow the road south through Silverpine and towards Hillsbrad. Follow the signs!

2480.name: Hinott's Assistance
2480.objective: Wait for Serge Hinott to complete the cure.

2498.name: Return to Denalan
2498.objective: Rellian Greenspyre wants you to speak with Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.

2499.name: Oakenscowl
2499.objective: Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth wants you to collect the Gargantuan Tumor from Oakenscowl.

2500.name: Badlands Reagent Run
2500.objective: Acquire the reagents Ghak Healtouch needs from the Badlands, then return to him in Thelsamar.

2501.objective: Use the empty thaumaturgy vessels on scorched guardian dragons found in the Badlands.  Once you have them filled, bring them to Ghak Healtouch in Thelsamar.

2518.name: Tears of the Moon
2518.objective: Priestess A'moora in the Temple of the Moon at Darnassus wants you to bring her Lady Sathrah's Silvery Spinnerets.

2519.objective: Sister Aquinne wants you to speak with Priestess A'moora in the Temple of the Moon.

2520.objective: Priestess A'moora wants you to place Lady Sathrah's silvery spinnerets at the fountain inside the temple, and then return to her.

2521.name: To Serve Kum'isha
2521.objective: In your journeys throughout the Blasted Lands, should you ever come across a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere, take the item back to Kum'isha the Collector.$B$BBe warned, this gem is one of the most rare crystals in all of Azeroth. Any creature in these lands could be holding a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere.$B$BYou will be rewarded for each Flawless Draenethyst Sphere you have collected.

2522.name: Kum'isha's Endeavors
2522.objective: Find and return a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere to Kum'isha the Collector.

2541.name: The Sleeping Druid

2561.objective: Oben Rageclaw wants you to kill his soulless body, and then use the Voodoo Charm.

2583.objective: Bring three Blasted Boar Lungs, two Scorpok Pincers, and one Basilisk Brain to Bloodmage Drazial.

2584.objective: Bring three Blasted Boar Lungs, two Scorpok Pincers, and one Basilisk Brain to Bloodmage Drazial.

2601.objective: Bring ten Basilisk Brains and two Vulture Gizzards to Bloodmage Lynnore.

2603.objective: Bring ten Vulture Gizzards and two Snickerfang Jowls to Bloodmage Lynnore.

2604.objective: Bring ten Vulture Gizzards and two Snickerfang Jowls to Bloodmage Lynnore.

2606.objective: Marin Noggenfogger wants you to speak with Sprinkle in Gadgetzan.

2607.objective: Speak with Doc Mixilpixil in the cellar of the Barracks.

2608.name: The Touch of Zanzil
2608.objective: /Lay down to be examined by Doc Mixilpixil. How can he find the cure if he can't find the cause?

2609.name: The Touch of Zanzil
2609.objective: Bring Doc Mixilpixil one bundle of Simple Wildflowers, one Leaded Vial, one Bronze Tube, and one Spool of Light Chartreuse Silk Thread. The 'itis' doesn't cure itself, young $g fella:lady;.
gather: Spool of Light Chartreuse Silk Thread

2853.objective: Give Pratt's Letter to Telonis, the master leatherworker of Darnassus.

2867.objective: Return to Shandris Feathermoon in the Feathermoon Stronghold and report your findings.
