3764.name: Un'Goro Soil
3764.objective: Bring 20 Un'Goro Soil samples to Jenal at the Cenarion Enclave in Darnassus.

3765.name: The Corruption Abroad
3765.objective: Travel to Gershala Nightwhisper in Auberdine.

3781.name: Morrowgrain Research
3781.objective: Take the Arch Druid's Seed Voucher to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus.

3782.name: Morrowgrain Research
3782.objective: Take the Seed Voucher to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

3783.name: Are We There, Yeti?
3783.objective: Collect 10 Thick Yeti Furs for Umi Rumplesnicker in Everlook.

3784.name: Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
3784.objective: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

3785.name: Morrowgrain Research
3785.objective: Use an Evergreen Pouch with a Packet of Tharlendis Seeds and two Un'Goro Soil samples to try and cultivate samples of Morrowgrain.$B$BBring 10 Morrowgrain to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus.

3786.name: Morrowgrain Research
3786.objective: Use an Evergreen Pouch with a Packet of Tharlendis Seeds and two Un'Goro Soil samples to try and cultivate samples of Morrowgrain.$B$BBring 10 Morrowgrain to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

3787.name: Jonespyre's Request
3787.objective: Speak with Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

3788.name: Jonespyre's Request
3788.objective: Speak with Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

3789.name: Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
3789.objective: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

3790.name: Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
3790.objective: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

3791.name: The Mystery of Morrowgrain
3791.objective: Bring 10 Morrowgrain to Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

3801.name: Dark Iron Legacy
3801.objective: Speak with Franclorn Forgewright if you are interested in obtaining a key to the city major.

3802.name: Dark Iron Legacy
3802.objective: Slay Fineous Darkvire and recover the great hammer, Ironfel. Take Ironfel to the Shrine of Thaurissan and place it on the statue of Franclorn Forgewright.

3821.name: Dreadmaul Rock
3821.objective: Venture forth to the Burning Steppes and find out what became of Sha'ni Proudtusk.

3822.name: Krom'Grul
3822.objective: Recover Sha'ni's Nose-Ring from Krom'Grul and return it to Thal'trak in Kargath. Search the various caves and mines in Dreadmaul Rock.

3823.name: Extinguish the Firegut
3823.objective: Slay 15 Firegut Ogre-Mages, 7 Firegut Ogres, and 7 Firegut Ogre Brutes, and return to Oralius when you are finished.

3824.name: Gor'tesh the Brute Lord
3824.objective: Find Gor'tesh, somewhere to the west of Dreadmaul Rock. Kill Gor'tesh and then take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head back to Oralius in Burning Steppes.

3825.name: Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
3825.objective: Take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head and place it at the top of Dreadmaul Rock. Look for a soft dirt mound to plant the pike.

3841.name: An Orphan Looking For a Home
3841.objective: Speak to Quentin in Thousand Needles.

3842.name: A Short Incubation
3842.objective: Bring 2 Elixir of Fortitudes to Quentin in Thousand Needles.

3843.name: The Newest Member of the Family
3843.objective: Take your Fragile Sprite Darter Egg to the Hinterlands and speak to Agnar Beastamer, but hurry, you only have 1 hour to find him before the hatchling within the egg dies.

3844.name: It's a Secret to Everybody
3844.objective: Look around in the pond for a clue about who this wrecked raft may belong to.

3845.name: It's a Secret to Everybody
3845.objective: Examine the items inside the pack and bring them to their owner.

3861.name: CLUCK!
3861.objective: Find some Special Chicken Feed and return to your befriended chicken. When you find it, /cheer at it before trying to give it the Special Chicken Feed.

3881.name: Expedition Salvation
3881.objective: Bring a Crate of Foodstuffs and Research Equipment to Williden Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

3882.name: Roll the Bones
3882.objective: Bring 8 Dinosaur Bones to Spark Nilminer in Un'Goro Crater.

3883.name: Alien Ecology
3883.objective: Use the Scraping Vial to collect a Hive Wall Sample from one of the Gorishi hive hatcheries in Un'Goro Crater.  Look for the chambers with the hanging larval spawns.$B$BBring the Hive Wall Sample to Hol'anyee Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

3884.name: Williden's Journal
3884.objective: Return the journal to Williden Marshal somewhere in Un'Goro Crater.

3901.name: Rattling the Rattlecages
3901.objective: Kill 12 Rattlecage Skeletons, and then return to Shadow Priest Sarvis in Deathknell when you are done.

3902.name: Scavenging Deathknell
3902.objective: Search Deathknell and the vicinity for 6 pieces of Scavenged Goods, and return them to Deathguard Saltain.

3904.name: Milly's Harvest
3904.objective: Bring 8 crates of Milly's Harvest to Milly Osworth at Northshire Abbey.

3905.name: Grape Manifest
3905.objective: Bring the Grape Manifest to Brother Neals in Northshire Abbey.

3906.name: Disharmony of Flame
3906.objective: Travel to the quarry in Blackrock Mountain and slay Overmaster Pyron. Return to Thunderheart when you have completed this assignment.

3907.name: Disharmony of Fire
3907.objective: Enter Blackrock Depths and track down Lord Incendius. Slay him and return any source of information you may find to Thunderheart.

3908.name: It's a Secret to Everybody
3908.objective: Take Linken's Sword to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

3909.name: The Videre Elixir
3909.objective: Seek out Gregan Brewspewer in northern Feralas. From him, learn how you may acquire the Videre Elixir, then return to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

3912.name: Meet at the Grave
3912.objective: Go to the graveyard outside Gadgetzan, and use the Videre Elixir. Follow the rest of Donova's instructions to find Gaeriyan.

3913.name: A Grave Situation
3913.objective: Resurrect, then look for the gravestone that Gaeriyan told you to find.

3914.name: Linken's Sword
3914.objective: Deliver Linken's Superior Sword to Linken in Un'Goro Crater.

3921.name: Wenikee Boltbucket
3921.objective: Bring the Broken Samophlange to Wenikee Boltbucket.

3922.name: Nugget Slugs
3922.objective: Bring 15 Nugget Slugs to Wenikee Boltbucket in the Barrens.

3923.name: Rilli Greasygob
3923.objective: Bring the Broken and Battered Samophlange to Rilli Greasygob in Orgrimmar.

3924.name: Samophlange Manual
3924.objective: Bring the Samophlange Manual to Rilli Greasygob in Orgrimmar.

3941.name: A Gnome's Assistance
3941.objective: Find J.D. Collie in the cave at Marshal's Refuge.

3942.name: Linken's Memory
3942.objective: Find Eridan Bluewind in southern Felwood.

3961.name: Linken's Adventure
3961.objective: Take the Silver Totem of Aquementas to Linken in Marshal's Refuge.

3962.name: It's Dangerous to Go Alone
3962.objective: Travel to Fire Plume Ridge, south of Marshal's Refuge.$B$BFind Blazerunner and use the totem to remove his protective aura. Once he has been defeated, acquire the Golden Flame from the cave.

3981.name: Commander Gor'shak
3981.objective: Find Commander Gor'shak in Blackrock Depths.$B$BYou recall that the crudely drawn picture of the orc included bars drawn over the portrait. Perhaps you should search for a prison of some sort.

4001.name: What Is Going On?
4001.objective: Speak with Kharan Mighthammer and gather information about Princess Moira Bronzebeard's kidnapping. Take that information to Thrall in Orgrimmar.$B$BYou recall Gor'shak mentioning that Kharan is being held in a cell nearby.

4002.name: The Eastern Kingdom
4002.objective: Speak with Thrall if you are prepared to take on the mission he has planned.

4003.name: The Royal Rescue
4003.objective: Slay Emperor Dagran Thaurissan and free Princess Moira Bronzebeard from his evil spell.

4005.name: Aquementas
4005.objective: Take the Book of Aquor, the Silvery Claws, and the Irontree Heart to Tanaris.$B$BUse the Book of Aquor to summon Aquementas.$B$BAfter you have the completed totem, take it to J.D. Collie in Marshal's Refuge.

4021.name: Counterattack!
4021.objective: Bring a Piece of Krom'zar's Banner to Regthar Deathgate, west of the Crossroads.

4022.name: A Taste of Flame
4022.objective: Show Cyrus Therepentous the Black Dragonflight Molt you received from Kalaran Windblade.

4023.name: A Taste of Flame
4023.objective: Show Cyrus Therepentous proof of your worth.$B$BYou have a feeling that Cyrus already knows that you are unworthy.

4024.name: A Taste of Flame
4024.objective: Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay Bael'Gar.$B$BYou only know that the giant resides inside Blackrock Depths. Remember to use the Altered Black Dragonflight Molt on Bael'Gar's remains to capture the Fiery Essence.$B$BReturn the Encased Fiery Essence to Cyrus Therepentous.$B$B

4061.name: The Rise of the Machines
4061.objective: Venture to the Burning Steppes and recover 10 Fractured Elemental Shards for Hierophant Theodora Mulvadania.$B$BYou recall Theodora mentioning the golems and elementals of that region as being a source for these shards.

4062.name: The Rise of the Machines
4062.objective: Take the Elemental Shard Sample to Lotwil Veriatus.$B$BYou recall Theodora saying that Lotwil was stationed in a camp to the east.

4063.name: The Rise of the Machines
4063.objective: Find and slay Golem Lord Argelmach. Return his head to Lotwil. You will also need to collect 10 Intact Elemental Cores from the Ragereaver Golems and Warbringer Constructs protecting Argelmach. You know this because you are psychic.

4081.name: KILL ON SIGHT: Dark Iron Dwarves
4081.objective: Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!$B$BWarlord Goretooth wants you to kill 15 Anvilrage Guardsmen, 10 Anvilrage Wardens and 5 Anvilrage Footmen. Return to him once your task is complete.$B$B

4082.name: KILL ON SIGHT: High Ranking Dark Iron Officials
4082.objective: Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!$B$BWarlord Goretooth wants you to kill 10 Anvilrage Medics, 10 Anvilrage Soldiers and 10 Anvilrage Officers. Return to him once your task is complete.

4084.name: Silver Heart
4084.objective: Collect 11 Silvery Claws and 1 Irontree Heart for Eridan Bluewind in Felwood.

4101.name: Cleansing Felwood
4101.objective: Bring 15 Blood Amber to Arathandris Silversky in Felwood.

4102.name: Cleansing Felwood
4102.objective: Bring 15 Blood Amber to Maybess Riverbreeze in Felwood.

4120.name: The Strength of Corruption
4120.objective: Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas wants you to kill 12 Angerclaw Grizzlies and 12 Felpaw Ravagers in Felwood.

4121.name: Precarious Predicament
4121.objective: Escort your prisoner, Grark Lorkrub, through Burning Steppes and through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge.$B$BYou recall Lexlort mentioning that he would have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.$B$BYou will also be required to hand over your Thorium Shackles to Lexlort.

4122.name: Grark Lorkrub
4122.objective: Travel to the Burning Steppes and find Grark Lorkrub. You recall Lexlort mentioning that he was last seen in a massive Blackrock fortress.$B$BWhen you find Grark Lorkrub, use the Thorium Shackles to bind him and then lead him back through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge. Lexlort will have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.

4123.name: The Heart of the Mountain
4123.objective: Bring the Heart of the Mountain to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.

4124.name: The Missing Courier
4124.objective: Speak with Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold.

4125.name: The Missing Courier
4125.objective: Locate the courier's boat somewhere along the coast of Feralas.

4126.name: Hurley Blackbreath
4126.objective: Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Ragnar Thunderbrew in Kharanos.

4127.name: Boat Wreckage
4127.objective: Return to Feathermoon Stronghold and show Ginro Hearthkindle the Discarded Knife you have found.

4129.name: The Knife Revealed
4129.objective: Take the Discarded Knife to Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

4130.name: Psychometric Reading
4130.objective: Speak with Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold.

4131.name: The Woodpaw Gnolls
4131.objective: Search the Woodpaw Gnoll camps of southern Feralas for evidence of the courier's belongings or the courier himself.

4132.name: Operation: Death to Angerforge
4132.objective: Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay General Angerforge! Return to Warlord Goretooth when the task is complete.

4133.name: Vivian Lagrave
4133.objective: Speak with Shadowmaster Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

4134.name: Lost Thunderbrew Recipe
4134.objective: Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

4135.name: The Writhing Deep
4135.objective: Now that Raschal's last known whereabouts have been discovered, continue your search for him or his remains in the Writhing Deep.  According to the note, it is located to the south of the Woodpaw gnoll camps.

4136.name: Ribbly Screwspigot
4136.objective: Bring Ribbly's Head to Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.

4141.name: Muigin and Larion
4141.objective: Collect 15 Bloodpetals and return to Muigin.

4142.name: A Visit to Gregan
4142.objective: Take a Bloodpetal to Gregan Brewspewer in Feralas.

4143.name: Haze of Evil
4143.objective: Collect 5 samples of Atal'ai Haze, then return to Muigin in Un'Goro Crater.

4145.name: Larion and Muigin
4145.objective: Hunt 5 Bloodpetal Lashers, 5 Bloodpetal Threshers, 5 Bloodpetal Flayers and 5 Bloodpetal Trappers for Larion at Marshal's Refuge.

4146.name: Zapper Fuel
4146.objective: Deliver the Unloaded Zapper and 5 samples of Atal'ai Haze to Larion in Marshal's Refuge.

4147.name: Marvon's Workshop
4147.objective: Travel to Marvon Rivetseeker's workshop in Ratchet.

4161.name: Recipe of the Kaldorei
4161.objective: Collect 7 Small Spider Legs for Zarrin in Dolanaar.

4181.name: Goblin Engineering
4181.objective: If you wish to learn more about Goblin Engineering, take the Manual of Engineering Disciplines to Nixx Sprocketspring in Gadgetzan.

4182.name: Dragonkin Menace
4182.objective: Slay 15 Black Broodlings, 10 Black Dragonspawn, 4 Black Wyrmkin and 1 Black Drake. Return to Helendis Riverhorn when the task is complete.

4183.name: The True Masters
4183.objective: Travel to Lakeshire and deliver Helendis Riverhorn's Letter to Magistrate Solomon.

4184.name: The True Masters
4184.objective: Travel to Stormwind and deliver Solomon's Plea to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon.$B$BBolvar resides in Stormwind Keep.

4185.name: The True Masters
4185.objective: Speak with Highlord Bolvar Fordragon after speaking with Lady Katrana Prestor.

4186.name: The True Masters
4186.objective: Take Bolvar's Decree to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire.

4201.name: The Love Potion
4201.objective: Bring 4 Gromsblood, 10 Giant Silver Veins and Nagmara's Filled Vial to Mistress Nagmara in Blackrock Depths.

4223.name: The True Masters
4223.objective: Speak with Marshal Maxwell in the Burning Steppes.

4224.name: The True Masters
4224.objective: Speak with Ragged John to learn of Marshal Windsor's fate and return to Marshal Maxwell when you have completed this task.$B$BYou recall Marshal Maxwell telling you to search for him in a cave to the north.

4241.name: Marshal Windsor
4241.objective: Travel to Blackrock Mountain in the northwest and enter Blackrock Depths. Find out what became of Marshal Windsor.$B$BYou recall Ragged John talking about Windsor being dragged off to a prison.

4242.name: Abandoned Hope
4242.objective: Give Marshal Maxwell the bad news.

4244.name: Chasing A-Me 01
4244.objective: Find a Mithril Casing and return to A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.

4245.name: Chasing A-Me 01
4245.objective: Escort A-Me 01 back to Karna Remtravel in Un'Goro Crater.

4261.name: Ancient Spirit
4261.objective: Escort Arei to safety, then speak with Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song, in eastern Ashenvale.

4262.name: Overmaster Pyron
4262.objective: Slay Overmaster Pyron and return to Jalinda Sprig.$B$BYou recall Jalinda talking about Pyron guarding the quarry. Perhaps you should search there?

4263.name: Incendius!
4263.objective: Find Lord Incendius in Blackrock Depths and destroy him!

4264.name: A Crumpled Up Note
4264.objective: You may have just stumbled on to something that Marshal Windsor would be interested in seeing. There may be hope, after all.

4265.name: Freed from the Hive
4265.objective: Free Raschal from the Zukk'ash hive.$B$BReturn to Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold and let him know that Raschal is alive and well.

4266.name: A Hero's Welcome
4266.objective: Speak with Shandris Feathermoon in Feathermoon Stronghold.

4267.name: Rise of the Silithid
4267.objective: Bring Raschal's Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

4281.name: Thalanaar Delivery
4281.objective: Bring the Undelivered Parcel to Falfindel Waywarder in Thalanaar.

4282.name: A Shred of Hope
4282.objective: Return Marshal Windsor's Lost Information.$B$BMarshal Windsor believes that the information is being held by Golem Lord Argelmach and General Angerforge.

4283.name: FIFTY! YEP!
4283.objective: Oralius wants 50 Blackrock Medallions. Chances are high that these medallions can be found on the orcs in the Burning Steppes.

4284.name: Crystals of Power
4284.objective: Collect 7 Power Crystals of each color: red, blue, yellow, and green. Bring them to J.D. Collie at Marshal's Refuge.

4285.name: The Northern Pylon
4285.objective: Discover the location of the Northern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.

4286.name: The Good Stuff
4286.objective: Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 20 Dark Iron Fanny Packs. Return to Oralius when you have completed this task. You assume that the Dark Iron dwarves inside Blackrock Depths carry these 'fanny pack' contraptions.

4287.name: The Eastern Pylon
4287.objective: Discover the location of the Eastern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.

4288.name: The Western Pylon
4288.objective: Discover the location of the Western Crystal Pylon.

4289.name: The Apes of Un'Goro
4289.objective: Bring 2 Un'Goro Gorilla Pelts, 2 Un'Goro Stomper Pelts, and 2 Un'Goro Thunderer Pelts to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.

4290.name: The Fare of Lar'korwi
4290.objective: Find the carcass of Lar'korwi's freshest kill and steal a Piece of Threshadon Carcass before returning to Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.

4291.name: The Scent of Lar'korwi
4291.objective: Bring 2 Ravasaur Pheromone Glands to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.

4292.name: The Bait for Lar'korwi
4292.objective: Using the contents of Torwa's Pouch, summon Lar'korwi and defeat him. Then bring Lar'korwi's Head to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.

4293.name: A Sample of Slime...
4293.objective: Gather Felwood Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Felwood. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most corrupt. Bring 5 of the Corrupted Felwood Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

4294.name: ... and a Batch of Ooze
4294.objective: Gather Un'Goro Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Un'Goro Crater. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most pure. Bring 5 of the Pure Un'Goro Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

4296.name: Tablet of the Seven
4296.objective: Bring the Tablet Transcript to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.

4297.name: Food for Baby
4297.objective: Bring 5 Silvermane Stalker Flanks to Agnar Beastamer in Hinterlands.

4298.name: Becoming a Parent
4298.objective: Speak to Agnar Beastamer in the Hinterlands.

4300.name: Bone-Bladed Weapons
4300.objective: Bring 8 White Ravasaur Claws to Jes'rimon in Orgrimmar.

4301.name: The Mighty U'cha
4301.objective: Bring U'cha's Pelt to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.

4321.name: Making Sense of It
4321.objective: Speak with J.D. Collie in a moment.

4322.name: Jail Break!
4322.objective: Help Marshal Windsor get his gear back and free his friends. Return to Marshal Maxwell if you succeed.

4324.name: Yuka Screwspigot
4324.objective: Speak with Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.

4341.name: Kharan Mighthammer
4341.objective: Travel to Blackrock Depths and find Kharan Mighthammer.$B$BThe King mentioned that Kharan was being held prisoner there - perhaps you should try looking for a prison.

4342.name: Kharan's Tale
4342.objective: Listen as Kharan Mighthammer tells his story.

4361.name: The Bearer of Bad News
4361.objective: Return to Ironforge and deliver the bad news to King Magni Bronzebeard.

4362.name: The Fate of the Kingdom
4362.objective: Return to Blackrock Depths and rescue Princess Moira Bronzebeard from the evil clutches of Emperor Dagran Thaurissan.

4363.name: The Princess's Surprise
4363.objective: Return to Ironforge and speak with King Magni Bronzebeard.

4402.name: Galgar's Cactus Apple Surprise
4402.objective: Bring Galgar 10 Cactus Apples. You remember him saying that they could be found near cactuses.

4421.name: The Corruption of the Jadefire
4421.objective: Kill 11 Jadefire Felsworns, 9 Jadefire Shadowstalkers, 9 Jadefire Rogues, and Xavathras. Return to Eridan Bluewind in Felwood when the task has been completed.

4441.name: Felbound Ancients
4441.objective: Travel to Darnassus and use Eridan's Vial to collect a Vial of Blessed Water from the Temple of the Moon. Return to Eridan with the filled vial.

4442.name: Purified!
4442.objective: Speak to Eridan again in a moment.

4449.name: Caught!
4449.objective: Kill 8 Dark Iron Geologists and bring 15 pieces of Silk Cloth to the person locked in the outhouse in Searing Gorge.

4450.name: Ledger from Tanaris
4450.objective: Take the copy of Goodsteel's Ledger and then find the items listed in it before seeking Krinkle Goodsteel in Tanaris.

4451.name: The Key to Freedom
4451.objective: Search Searing Gorge and find a use for the Grimesilt Outhouse Key you have found.

4485.name: The Tome of Nobility
4485.objective: Speak to Duthorian Rall in Stormwind.

4486.name: The Tome of Nobility
4486.objective: Speak to Duthorian Rall in Stormwind.

4487.name: Summon Felsteed
4487.objective: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

4488.name: Summon Felsteed
4488.objective: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

4489.name: Summon Felsteed
4489.objective: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet.

4490.name: Summon Felsteed
4490.objective: Speak to Strahad Farsan in Ratchet to learn the ability to summon a Felsteed.

4491.name: A Little Help From My Friends
4491.objective: Lead Ringo to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.$B$BIf Ringo faints, use Spraggle's Canteen to revive him.

4492.name: Lost!
4492.objective: Find Ringo at Fire Plume Ridge.

4493.name: March of the Silithid
4493.objective: Speak to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

4494.name: March of the Silithid
4494.objective: Speak to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

4495.name: A Good Friend
4495.objective: Find Iverron by the cave to the north.

4496.name: Bungle in the Jungle
4496.objective: Bring a Gorishi Scent Gland and 5 Un'Goro Soil samples to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

4501.name: Beware of Pterrordax
4501.objective: Kill 10 Pterrordax and 15 Frenzied Pterrordax, then speak to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.

4502.name: Volcanic Activity
4502.objective: Collect 9 samples of Un'Goro Ash from the fire elementals around the volcano in Un'Goro Crater, and return them to Liv Rizzlefix in Ratchet.

4503.name: Shizzle's Flyer
4503.objective: Collect 8 Webbed Diemetradon Scales and 8 Webbed Pterrordax Scales for Shizzle in Marshal's Refuge.

4504.name: Super Sticky
4504.objective: Collect 12 samples of Super Sticky Tar for Tran'rek in Gadgetzan.

4505.name: Well of Corruption
4505.objective: Collect a sample of corrupted water from the Jadefire Satyrs' moonwell and bring it to Winna Hazzard at Bloodvenom Post.

4506.name: Corrupted Sabers
4506.objective: Take Winna's kitten to the corrupted moonwell, release it, then bring it back to Winna.$B$BOnce you have returned to Winna, click on the cat to release it to Winna.

4507.name: Pawn Captures Queen
4507.objective: Defeat the Gorishi Hive Queen once she is summoned.$B$BBring the Gorishi Queen's Brain to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

4508.name: Calm Before the Storm
4508.objective: Bring Pestlezugg's Un'Goro Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

4509.name: Calm Before the Storm
4509.objective: Bring Pestlezugg's Un'Goro Report to Zilzibin Drumlore in Orgrimmar.

4510.name: Calm Before the Storm
4510.objective: Bring the Bank Voucher to Idriana in the bank of Darnassus.

4511.name: Calm Before the Storm
4511.objective: Bring the Bank Voucher to Karus in the bank of Orgrimmar.

4512.name: A Little Slime Goes a Long Way
4512.objective: Bring 6 Filled Cursed Ooze Jars and 6 Filled Tainted Ooze Jars to Laris Geardawdle in Ironforge.

4513.name: A Little Slime Goes a Long Way
4513.objective: Bring 10 Filled Pure Sample Jars to Laris Geardawdle in Ironforge.$B$BIf you have trouble finding them, perhaps try to get more clues from Laris.

4521.name: Wild Guardians
4521.objective: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to kill 15 Raging Owlbeasts and 15 Ragged Owlbeasts.

4542.name: Message to Freewind Post
4542.objective: Bring the Urgent Message to Cliffwatcher Longhorn at Freewind Post.

4581.name: Kayneth Stillwind
4581.objective: Take Shindrell's Note to Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song.

4601.name: The Sparklematic 5200!
4601.objective: Insert a Grime-Encrusted Item into the Sparklematic 5200, and be sure to have three silver coins to start the machine.

4602.name: The Sparklematic 5200!
4602.objective: Insert a Grime-Encrusted Item into the Sparklematic 5200, and be sure to have three silver coins to start the machine.

4621.name: Avast Ye, Admiral!
4621.objective: Slay Fleet Master Seahorn and Baron Revilgaz of Booty Bay, and then return to Fleet Master Firallon aboard the Crimson Veil off the coast of Stranglethorn Vale.

4641.name: Your Place In The World
4641.objective: Speak with Gornek. You recall Kaltunk marking your map with his location and mentioning that Gornek resided in the Den, a building to the west.

4642.name: Melding of Influences
4642.objective: Bring a Merged Ooze Sample to Chemist Fuely in Undercity.

4681.name: Washed Ashore
4681.objective: Recover the Sea Turtle Remains from the Skeletal Sea Turtle in the waters west of Auberdine, and then speak with Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde back in Auberdine.

4701.name: Put Her Down
4701.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy the source of the worg menace. As you left Helendis, he shouted a name: Halycon. It is what the orcs refer to in regards to the worg.

4721.name: Wild Guardians
4721.objective: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 10 Berserk Owlbeasts in Winterspring.

4722.name: Beached Sea Turtle
4722.objective: Take the Sea Turtle Remains to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4723.name: Beached Sea Creature
4723.objective: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4724.name: The Pack Mistress
4724.objective: Slay Halycon, pack mistress of the Bloodaxe worg.

4725.name: Beached Sea Turtle
4725.objective: Take the Strangely Marked Box to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4726.name: Broodling Essence
4726.objective: Bring 8 Broodling Essence and the Draco-Incarcinatrix 900 to Tinkee Steamboil at the Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.

4727.name: Beached Sea Turtle
4727.objective: Take the Sea Turtle Remains to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4728.name: Beached Sea Creature
4728.objective: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4729.name: Kibler's Exotic Pets
4729.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Bloodaxe Worg Pups. Use the cage to carry the ferocious little beasts. Bring back a Caged Worg Pup to Kibler.

4730.name: Beached Sea Creature
4730.objective: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4731.name: Beached Sea Turtle
4731.objective: Take the Strangely Marked Box to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4732.name: Beached Sea Turtle
4732.objective: Take the Sea Turtle Remains to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4733.name: Beached Sea Creature
4733.objective: Take the Sea Creature Bones to Gwennyth Bly'Leggonde in Auberdine.

4734.name: Egg Freezing
4734.objective: Use the Eggscilloscope Prototype on an egg in the Rookery.

4735.name: Egg Collection
4735.objective: Bring 8 Collected Dragon Eggs and the Collectronic Module to Tinkee Steamboil at Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.

4736.name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
4736.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4737.name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
4737.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4738.name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
4738.objective: Speak with Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4739.name: In Search of Menara Voidrender
4739.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4740.name: WANTED: Murkdeep!
4740.objective: Find and slay the murloc known as Murkdeep.  The creature is thought to be defending the murloc huts south of Auberdine along the water.$B$BReport the death of Murkdeep to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

4741.name: Wild Guardians
4741.objective: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 13 Moontouched Owlbeasts.

4742.name: Seal of Ascension
4742.objective: Find the three gemstones of command: The Gemstone of Smolderthorn, Gemstone of Spirestone, and Gemstone of Bloodaxe. Return them, along with the Unadorned Seal of Ascension, to Vaelan.$B$BThe Generals, as told to you by Vaelan, are: War Master Voone of the Smolderthorn; Highlord Omokk of the Spirestone; and Overlord Wyrmthalak  of the Bloodaxe.

4743.name: Seal of Ascension
4743.objective: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh. Find the ancient drake, Emberstrife and beat him without mercy until his will is broken.$B$BIt is at that moment which you must place the Unforged Seal of Ascension before the great beast. You must then be quick to use the Orb of Draconic Energy on his weakened form and claim dominion over his mental faculties. Control the beast and force the Flames of the Black Dragonflight upon the Unforged Seal of Ascension!

4761.name: Thundris Windweaver
4761.objective: Speak with Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine.

4762.name: The Cliffspring River
4762.objective: Travel north of Auberdine to the first waterfall along the Cliffspring River and draw a sample from the pool there.$B$BReturn to Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine with the Cliffspring River Sample.

4763.name: The Blackwood Corrupted
4763.objective: Fill the Empty Cleansing Bowl at the Auberdine Moonwell.$B$BGather a sample of fruit, nut, and grain from the northern Blackwood furbolg camps.$B$BMix the bowl and place it near the bonfire closest to the Cliffspring River at the northern camp, thus summoning the satyr corruptor.$B$BTake the Talisman of Corruption and bring it to Thundris Windweaver in Auberdine.

4764.name: Doomrigger's Clasp
4764.objective: Bring Doomrigger's Clasp to Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.

4765.name: Delivery to Ridgewell
4765.objective: Bring Ridgewell's Crate to Remington Ridgewell in Stormwind.

4766.name: Mayara Brightwing
4766.objective: Speak with Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.

4767.name: Wind Rider
4767.objective: Bring 10 Highperch Wyvern Eggs to Elu in Freewind Post.

4768.name: The Darkstone Tablet
4768.objective: Bring the Darkstone Tablet to Shadow Mage Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

4769.name: Vivian Lagrave and the Darkstone Tablet

4770.name: Homeward Bound
4770.objective: Escort Pao'ka Swiftmountain from Highperch, and then talk to Motega Firemane in Whitereach Post.

4771.name: Dawn's Gambit
4771.objective: Place Dawn's Gambit in the Viewing Room of the Scholomance.  Defeat Vectus, then return to Betina Bigglezink.

4781.name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
4781.objective: Bring a Gold Bar to Xizk Goodstitch in Stranglethorn Vale.

4782.name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
4782.objective: Return to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4783.name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
4783.objective: Bring 10 Vials of Hatefury Blood and 1 Lesser Infernal Stone to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4784.name: Components for the Enchanted Gold Bloodrobe
4784.objective: Bring some Fine Gold Thread, 2 Smoldering Coals, and a Soul Shard to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4786.name: The Completed Robe
4786.objective: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete your robe and then speak to her again.

4787.name: The Ancient Egg
4787.objective: Bring the Ancient Egg to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.

4788.name: The Final Tablets
4788.objective: Bring the Fifth and Sixth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.

4808.name: Felnok Steelspring
4808.objective: Give Tinkee's Letter to Felnok Steelspring.

4809.name: Chillwind Horns
4809.objective: Bring 8 Uncracked Chillwind Horns to Felnok Steelspring.

4810.name: Return to Tinkee
4810.objective: Bring Felnok's Package to Tinkee Steamboil in the Burning Steppes.

4811.name: The Red Crystal
4811.objective: Travel east of Auberdine and look for a large, red crystal along Darkshore's eastern mountain range.  Report back what you find to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

4812.name: As Water Cascades
4812.objective: Fill the Empty Water Tube at the Auberdine moonwell, and then investigate the red crystal along Darkshore's eastern mountain wall.

4813.name: The Fragments Within
4813.objective: Report back what you have found to Sentinel Glynda Nal'Shea in Auberdine.

4821.name: Alien Egg
4821.objective: Return the Alien Egg to Hagar Lightninghoof in Freewind Post.

4822.name: You Scream, I Scream...
4822.objective: Get some Strawberry Ice Cream for your ward.  The lad seems to prefer Tigule and Foror's brand ice cream.
gather: Tigule and Foror's Strawberry Ice Cream

4841.name: Pacify the Centaur
4841.objective: Kill 12 Galak Scouts, 10 Galak Wranglers, and 6 Galak Windchasers, and then return to Cliffwatcher Longhorn in Freewind Post.

4842.name: Strange Sources
4842.objective: Follow Donova Snowden's instructions, then report back.

4861.name: Enraged Wildkin
4861.objective: Locate Jaron Stoneshaper's wrecked camp and supplies in southern Winterspring.

4862.name: En-Ay-Es-Tee-Why
4862.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 15 Spire Spider Eggs for Kibler.$B$BBy the sound of it, these eggs could be found near spiders.

4864.name: Enraged Wildkin
4864.objective: Pick up Jaron's Supplies from the snow, then find the wildkin that stole the amulet Jaron spoke of.$B$BBring Jaron's Supplies and the Blue-feathered Amulet to Jaron Stoneshaper at the lodge in Winterspring.

4865.name: Serpent Wild
4865.objective: Report your findings to Motega Firemane.

4866.name: Mother's Milk
4866.objective: In the heart of Blackrock Spire you will find Mother Smolderweb. Engage her and get her to poison you. Chances are good that you will have to kill her as well. Return to Ragged John when you are poisoned so that he can 'milk' you.

4867.name: Urok Doomhowl
4867.objective: Read Warosh's Scroll.  Bring Warosh's Mojo to Warosh.

4881.name: Assassination Plot
4881.objective: Warn Kanati Greycloud at Whitereach Post of the plot to kill him.

4882.name: Guarding Secrets
4882.objective: Take the Blue-feathered Necklace to Trull Failbane at Bloodvenom Post.

4883.name: Guarding Secrets
4883.objective: Take the Blue-feathered Necklace to Nara Wildmane.

4901.name: Guardians of the Altar
4901.objective: Protect Ranshalla while she attempts to reactivate the Altar of Elune. Report your findings to Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village.

4902.name: Wildkin of Elune
4902.objective: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

4903.name: Warlord's Command
4903.objective: Slay Highlord Omokk, War Master Voone, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Recover Important Blackrock Documents. Return to Warlord Goretooth in Kargath when the mission has been accomplished.

4904.name: Free at Last
4904.objective: Escort Lakota Windsong from the Darkcloud Pinnacle, and then talk to Thalia Amberhide at Freewind Post.

4906.name: Further Corruption
4906.objective: Eridan Bluewind in Felwood wants you to kill 8 Jadefire Hellcallers, 8 Jadefire Betrayers, 8 Jadefire Tricksters, and Xavaric. Return to Eridan when the task is completed.

4921.name: Lost in Battle
4921.objective: Find Mankrik's wife and then return to him in the Crossroads.

4941.name: Eitrigg's Wisdom
4941.objective: Speak with Eitrigg in Orgrimmar. When you have discussed matters with Eitrigg, seek council from Thrall.$B$BYou recall having seen Eitrigg in Thrall's chamber.

4961.name: Cleansing of the Orb of Orahil
4961.objective: Kill the Demon of the Orb, then speak with Tabetha.

4962.name: Shard of a Felhound
4962.objective: Take the Felhas Ruby and use it on one of the Felhounds found in Desolace. After successful, bring the Felhas Ruby and the Imprisoned Felhound Spirit back to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4963.name: Shard of an Infernal
4963.objective: Take the Infus Emerald and use it on one of the Infernals found in Desolace. After successful, bring the Infus Emerald and the Imprisoned Infernal Spirit back to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4964.name: The Completed Orb of Dar'Orahil
4964.objective: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete the Orb of Dar'Orahil and then speak to her again.

4965.name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
4965.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4966.name: Protect Kanati Greycloud
4966.objective: Protect Kanati Greycloud from the centaur attack.

4967.name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
4967.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4968.name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
4968.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4969.name: Knowledge of the Orb of Orahil
4969.objective: Speak to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4970.name: Frostsaber Provisions
4970.objective: Collect 5 Shardtooth Meats and 5 Chillwind Meats for Rivern Frostwind in Winterspring.

4971.name: A Matter of Time
4971.objective: Use the Temporal Displacer near one of Andorhal's silos and uncover Temporal Parasites.$B$BSlay 10 Temporal Parasites, and then return the Temporal Displacer to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

4972.name: Counting Out Time
4972.objective: Locate 5 Andorhal Watches, found in lockboxes amongst the rubble of the city.  Return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

4973.name: Counting Out Time
4973.objective: Locate 5 Andorhal Watches amongst the rubble of the city, and return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

4974.name: For The Horde!
4974.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Warchief Rend Blackhand. Take his head and return to Orgrimmar.

4975.name: The Completed Orb of Noh'Orahil
4975.objective: Wait for Menara Voidrender to complete the Orb of Noh'Orahil and then speak to her again.

4976.name: Returning the Cleansed Orb
4976.objective: Return the Cleansed Infernal Orb to Menara Voidrender in the Barrens.

4981.name: Operative Bijou
4981.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find out what happened to Bijou.

4982.name: Bijou's Belongings
4982.objective: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. You recall her mentioning that she stashed them on the bottom floor of the city.

4983.name: Bijou's Reconnaissance Report
4983.objective: Take Bijou's Reconnaissance Report back to Grandmaster Lexlort in Kargath.

4984.name: The Wildlife Suffers Too
4984.objective: Destroy 8 Diseased Wolves, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.

4985.name: The Wildlife Suffers Too
4985.objective: Destroy 8 Diseased Grizzlies, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.

4986.name: Glyphed Oaken Branch
4986.objective: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Darnassus is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

4987.name: Glyphed Oaken Branch
4987.objective: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Thunder Bluff is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

5001.name: Bijou's Belongings
5001.objective: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. Good luck!

5002.name: Message to Maxwell
5002.objective: Travel to the Burning Steppes and give Bijou's Information to Marshal Maxwell.

5021.name: Better Late Than Never
5021.objective: The ramblings of the ghostly woman indicated that she needed a package delivered.  She claimed that it was where her horse was.  As to where the horse is or where the package was to be delivered - the ghost remains incomprehensible.

5022.name: Better Late Than Never
5022.objective: Check with the Royal Factors of Stormwind to learn the whereabouts of an Emma Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located in City Hall.

5023.name: Better Late Than Never
5023.objective: Check with the Royal Overseers of the Undercity to learn the whereabouts of a Jeremiah Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located near guild and tabard registration.

5041.name: Supplies for the Crossroads
5041.objective: Find and return Crossroads' Supply Crates to Thork in the Barrens.

5047.name: Finkle Einhorn, At Your Service!
5047.objective: Talk to Malyfous Darkhammer in Everlook.
gather: Glowing Hunk of the Beast's Flesh

5048.name: Good Natured Emma
5048.objective: Find Ol' Emma in Stormwind and see if she is in fact Emma Felstone.  If she is, then perhaps she'd like the package Janice Felstone made for her.

5049.name: The Jeremiah Blues
5049.objective: Find Jeremiah Payson in the Undercity and see if he is in fact Jeremiah Felstone.  If he is, then perhaps he'd like the package Janice Felstone made for him.

5050.name: Good Luck Charm
5050.objective: Return to Janice Felstone in Western Plaguelands her Good Luck Half-Charm.

5051.name: Two Halves Become One
5051.objective: Locate the other half of the Good Luck Charm somewhere on the Felstone Farm in Western Plaguelands and reassemble it.$B$BGive the Good Luck Charm to Janice Felstone on the Felstone Farm, Western Plaguelands.

5052.name: Blood Shards of Agamaggan
5052.objective: Bring a Blood Shard to Mangletooth in Camp Taurajo in the Barrens.$B$BCollect more Blood Shards if you want him to bless you with Agamaggan's power.

5054.name: Ursius of the Shardtooth
5054.objective: Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Ursius.

5055.name: Brumeran of the Chillwind
5055.objective: Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to kill Brumeran.

5056.name: Shy-Rotam
5056.objective: Storm Shadowhoof at Everlook in Winterspring wants you to defeat Shy-Rotam.

5057.name: Past Endeavors
5057.objective: Bring Storm Shadowhoof's Marker to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

5062.name: Sacred Fire
5062.objective: Gather 10 bushels of Incendia Agave, and then consult Magatha Grimtotem on Elder Rise in Thunderbluff.

5063.name: Cap of the Scarlet Savant
5063.objective: In order to create the Cap of the Scarlet Savant, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 8 Arcane Crystals; 5 Enchanted Scarlet Thread. $B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

5064.name: Grimtotem Spying
5064.objective: Locate and retrieve the three Secret Notes in Darkcloud Pinnacle.

5065.name: The Lost Tablets of Mosh'aru
5065.objective: Bring the Third and Fourth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.

5066.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
5066.objective: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

5067.name: Leggings of Arcana
5067.objective: In order to create the Leggings of Arcana, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 5 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Frostwhisper's Embalming Fluid.$B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

5068.name: Breastplate of Bloodthirst
5068.objective: In order to create the Breastplate of Bloodthirst, you will be required to bring the following items back to Malyfous Darkhammer: 1 Pristine Hide of the Beast; 10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings; 5 Arcanite Bars; 5 Skin of Shadow.$B$BYou will also be required to pay 50 gold pieces for the crafting of the item.

5081.name: Maxwell's Mission
5081.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy War Master Voone, Highlord Omokk, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.

5082.name: Threat of the Winterfall
5082.objective: Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Pathfinders, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Totemics.

5083.name: Winterfall Firewater
5083.objective: Bring the Empty Firewater Flask to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

5084.name: Falling to Corruption
5084.objective: Search the Deadwood furbolg camp in northern Felwood for a clue.

5085.name: Mystery Goo
5085.objective: Report back to Donova Snowden with your findings.

5086.name: Toxic Horrors
5086.objective: Collect 3 Toxic Horror Droplets for Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

5087.name: Winterfall Runners
5087.objective: Find the Winterfall Runners and stop them from delivering their shipment to Winterfall Village.

5088.name: Arikara
5088.objective: Slay Arikara. Bring her remains and the Incendia powder to Motega Firemane in Whitereach Post as proof of your deed.

5089.name: General Drakkisath's Command
5089.objective: Take General Drakkisath's Command to Marshal Maxwell in Burning Steppes.

5090.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
5090.objective: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

5091.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
5091.objective: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

5092.name: Clear the Way
5092.objective: Kill 10 Skeletal Flayers and 10 Slavering Ghouls in Sorrow Hill.$B$BReturn to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

5093.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
5093.objective: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.

5094.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
5094.objective: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.

5095.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
5095.objective: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glades and the Undercity.

5096.name: Scarlet Diversions
5096.objective: Proceed to the Scarlet Crusade's base camp between Felstone Field and Dalson's Tears and destroy their command tent.$B$BPlace the Scourge banner at the camp, and then return to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5097.name: All Along the Watchtowers
5097.objective: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to Commander Ashlam Valorfist in Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

5098.name: All Along the Watchtowers
5098.objective: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5102.name: General Drakkisath's Demise
5102.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy General Drakkisath. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.

5103.name: Hot Fiery Death
5103.objective: Someone in this world must know what to do with these gauntlets. Good luck!

5121.name: High Chief Winterfall
5121.objective: Donova Snowden in Winterspring wants you to defeat High Chief Winterfall.

5123.name: The Final Piece
5123.objective: Bring the Crudely-written Log to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

5124.name: Fiery Plate Gauntlets
5124.objective: Bring Malyfous Darkhammer 6 Enchanted Thorium Bars, 2 Essence of Fire, and 4 Star Rubies. You will also need to turn in your Unfired Plate Gauntlets.

5126.name: Lorax's Tale
5126.objective: Speak with Lorax. Listen to what he has to say.

5127.name: The Demon Forge
5127.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Goraluk Anvilcrack. Slay him and then use the Blood Stained Pike upon his corpse. After his soul has been siphoned, the pike will be Soul Stained.$B$BYou must also find the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate.$B$BReturn both the Soul Stained Pike and the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate to Lorax in Winterspring.

5128.name: Words of the High Chief
5128.objective: Take the Crudely-written Log to Kelek Skykeeper in southern Felwood.

5141.name: Dragonscale Leatherworking
5141.objective: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Peter Galen in Azshara.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

5143.name: Tribal Leatherworking
5143.objective: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Caryssia Moonhunter in Feralas.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

5144.name: Elemental Leatherworking
5144.objective: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Sarah Tanner in Searing Gorge.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

5145.name: Dragonscale Leatherworking
5145.objective: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Thorkaf Dragoneye in the Badlands.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

5146.name: Elemental Leatherworking
5146.objective: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Brumn Winterhoof in the Arathi Mountains.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

5147.name: Wanted - Arnak Grimtotem
5147.objective: Slay Arnak Grimtotem and bring proof of your deed to Cliffwatcher Longhorn in Freewind Post.

5148.name: Tribal Leatherworking
5148.objective: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Se'Jib in Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

5151.name: Hypercapacitor Gizmo
5151.objective: Slay the beast and bring back the Hypercapacitor Gizmo and Panther Cage Key to Wizlo Bearingshiner.

5152.name: Auntie Marlene
5152.objective: Speak with Marlene, south of the Ruins of Andorhal.

5153.name: A Strange Historian
5153.objective: Bring Joseph's Wedding Ring to Chromie.

5154.name: The Annals of Darrowshire
5154.objective: Bring the Annals of Darrowshire to Chromie in Andorhal.

5155.name: Forces of Jaedenar
5155.objective: Enter Jaedenar and slay 4 Jaedenar Hounds, 4 Jaedenar Guardsmen, 6 Jaedenar Adepts, and 6 Jaedenar Cultists before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

5156.name: Verifying the Corruption
5156.objective: Seek out and destroy 2 Entropic Beasts and 2 Entropic Horrors while exploring Shatter Scar Vale. After checking to see if the craters there are still filled with corrupt fel water, return to Taronn Redfeather in Felwood.

5157.name: Collection of the Corrupt Water
5157.objective: Take the Empty Canteen to the Moon Well in the center of Jaedenar and fill it before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

5158.name: Seeking Spiritual Aid
5158.objective: Take the Corrupt Moon Well Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

5159.name: Cleansed Water Returns to Felwood
5159.objective: Take the Purified Moon Well Water to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

5160.name: The Matron Protectorate
5160.objective: Travel to Winterspring and find Haleh. Give her Awbee's scale.

5161.name: Wrath of the Blue Flight
5161.objective: Speak with Haleh if you wish to continue.

5162.name: Wrath of the Blue Flight
5162.objective: Speak with Jeziba in the Plaguelands. He resides in Andorhal.

5163.name: Are We There, Yeti?
5163.objective: Take Umi's Mechanical Yeti and scare her friends with it:$B$BLegacki in Everlook (Winterspring)$BSprinkle in Gadgetzan (Tanaris)$BQuixxil in Marshal's Refuge (Un'Goro Crater)$B$BWhen you are done, bring the Mechanical Yeti back to Umi.

5164.name: Catalogue of the Wayward
5164.objective: Read from the Catalogue of the Wayward.

5165.name: Dousing the Flames of Protection
5165.objective: Using the Purified Moon Well Water, douse the flames of the four braziers of protection within Shadow Hold in Felwood, then return to Greta Mosshoof in the Emerald Sanctuary.

5166.name: Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight
5166.objective: To forge the Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings.

5167.name: Legplates of the Chromatic Defier
5167.objective: To forge the Legplates of the Chromatic Defier, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B5 Skin of Shadow.

5168.name: Heroes of Darrowshire
5168.objective: Bring Davil's Libram and Redpath's Shield to Carlin Redpath.

5181.name: Villains of Darrowshire
5181.objective: Bring the Skull of Horgus and the Shattered Sword of Marduk to Carlin Redpath at Light's Hope Chapel.

5201.name: Winterfall Intrusion
5201.objective: Rivern Frostwind wants you to slay 5 Winterfall Shaman and 5 Winterfall Ursa.

5202.name: A Strange Red Key
5202.objective: Search through Jaedenar to discover what the Blood Red Key is used for.

5203.name: Rescue From Jaedenar
5203.objective: Escort Arko'narin to where Lightforge and her equipment are being held, and then protect her as you escape Shadow Hold. Afterwards, seek out Jessir Moonbow in Felwood to let her know what's happened to her friends.

5204.name: Retribution of the Light
5204.objective: Return to Jaedenar and kill the succubus Rakaiah before finding the Remains of Trey Lightforge.

5206.name: Marauders of Darrowshire
5206.objective: Bring 5 Resonating Skulls and the Mystic Crystal to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.

5210.name: Brother Carlin
5210.objective: Bring the Extended Annals of Darrowshire to Carlin Redpath in Eastern Plaguelands.

5211.name: Defenders of Darrowshire
5211.objective: Free 15 Darrowshire Spirits and return to Carlin Redpath.

5212.name: The Flesh Does Not Lie
5212.objective: Recover 10 Plagued Flesh Samples from Stratholme and return them to Betina Bigglezink. You suspect that any creature in Stratholme would have said flesh sample.

5213.name: The Active Agent
5213.objective: Travel to Stratholme and search the ziggurats. Find and return new Scourge Data to Betina Bigglezink.

5214.name: The Great Fras Siabi
5214.objective: Find Fras Siabi's smoke shop in Stratholme and recover a box of Siabi's Premium Tobacco. Return to Smokey LaRue when the job is done.

5215.name: The Scourge Cauldrons
5215.objective: Speak with High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

5216.name: Target: Felstone Field
5216.objective: Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5217.name: Return to Chillwind Camp
5217.objective: Bring the Filled Felstone Field Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

8429.name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
8429.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

5219.name: Target: Dalson's Tears
5219.objective: Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5220.name: Return to Chillwind Camp
5220.objective: Bring the Filled Dalson's Tears Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

8428.name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
8428.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

5222.name: Target: Writhing Haunt
5222.objective: Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5223.name: Return to Chillwind Camp
5223.objective: Bring the Filled Writhing Haunt Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

5225.name: Target: Gahrron's Withering
5225.objective: Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5226.name: Return to Chillwind Point
5226.objective: Bring the Filled Gahrron's Withering Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

8427.name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
8427.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

5228.name: The Scourge Cauldrons
5228.objective: Speak with Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5229.name: Target: Felstone Field
5229.objective: Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5230.name: Return to the Bulwark
5230.objective: Bring the Filled Felstone Field Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5231.name: Target: Dalson's Tears
5231.objective: Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5232.name: Return to the Bulwark
5232.objective: Bring the Filled Dalson's Tears Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5233.name: Target: Writhing Haunt
5233.objective: Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5234.name: Return to the Bulwark
5234.objective: Bring the Filled Writhing Haunt Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at The Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5235.name: Target: Gahrron's Withering
5235.objective: Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

5236.name: Return to the Bulwark
5236.objective: Bring the Filled Gahrron's Withering Bottle to Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5242.name: A Final Blow
5242.objective: Kill Moora and Salia, and bring Shadow Lord Fel'dan's Head to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

5243.name: Houses of the Holy
5243.objective: Travel to Stratholme, in the north. Search the supply crates that litter the city and recover 5 Stratholme Holy Water. Return to Leonid Barthalomew the Revered when you have collected enough of the blessed fluid.

5244.name: The Ruins of Kel'Theril
5244.objective: Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper in Starfall Village.

5245.name: Troubled Spirits of Kel'Theril
5245.objective: Use Jaron's Pick to find the four Highborne Relic Fragments. Bring them to Aurora Skycaller in Eastern Plaguelands.

5246.name: Fragments of the Past
5246.objective: Find the Sacred Highborne Writings in the Temple of Zin-Malor in Azshara, and bring them to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.

5247.name: Fragments of the Past
5247.objective: Bring an Enchanted Thorium Bar, 5 Crystal Restore, and a Vial of Dire Water to Aurora Skycaller near the Northpass Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.

5248.name: Tormented By the Past
5248.objective: Take the Crystal of Zin-Malor to Lake Kel'Theril in Winterspring and find a highborne spirit that will speak to you.

5249.name: To Winterspring!
5249.objective: Find Starfall Village in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.

5250.name: Starfall
5250.objective: Find Starfall in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.

5251.name: The Archivist
5251.objective: Travel to Stratholme and find Archivist Galford of the Scarlet Crusade. Destroy him and burn down the Scarlet Archive.

5252.name: Remorseful Highborne
5252.objective: Speak with Wynd Nightchaser in Starfall Village, and ask about the proper place for the Crystal of Zin-Malor.

5253.name: The Crystal of Zin-Malor
5253.objective: Deliver the Crystal of Zin-Malor to Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

5262.name: The Truth Comes Crashing Down
5262.objective: Take the Head of Balnazzar to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff in the Eastern Plaguelands.

5263.name: Above and Beyond
5263.objective: Venture to Stratholme and destroy Baron Rivendare. Take his head and return to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff.

5264.name: Lord Maxwell Tyrosus
5264.objective: Speak with Lord Maxwell Tyrosus. He is inside the church.

5265.name: The Argent Hold
5265.objective: Open the Argent Hold and claim your reward.

5281.name: The Restless Souls
5281.objective: Find Egan. You only know that he was last seen around Stratholme.

5282.name: The Restless Souls
5282.objective: Use Egan's Blaster on the ghostly and spectral citizens of Stratholme. When the restless souls break free from their ghostly shells, use the blaster again - freedom will be theirs!$B$BFree 15 Restless Souls and return to Egan.

5283.name: The Art of the Armorsmith
5283.objective: To become an Armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Grumnus: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.

5284.name: The Way of the Weaponsmith
5284.objective: To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Ironus: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.

5301.name: The Art of the Armorsmith
5301.objective: To become an armorsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Okothos: 4 Ornate Mithril Helms, 2 Ornate Mithril Boots, 1 Ornate Mithril Breastplate.

5302.name: The Way of the Weaponsmith
5302.objective: To become a Weaponsmith, you must make the following items and return them to Borgosh: 4 Moonsteel Broadswords, 4 Massive Iron Axes, 2 Heavy Mithril Axes, and 2 Big Black Maces.

5305.name: Sweet Serenity
5305.objective: Travel to Stratholme and kill the Crimson Hammersmith. Recover the Crimson Hammersmith's Apron and return to Lilith.

5306.name: Snakestone of the Shadow Huntress
5306.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Shadow Hunter Vosh'gajin. Recover Vosh'gajin's Snakestone and return to Kilram.

5307.name: Corruption
5307.objective: Find the Black Guard Swordsmith in Stratholme and destroy him. Recover the Insignia of the Black Guard and return to Seril Scourgebane.

5321.name: The Sleeper Has Awakened
5321.objective: Escort Kerlonian Evershade to Liladris Moonriver at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.

5341.name: Barov Family Fortune
5341.objective: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Alexi Barov when you have completed this task.

5342.name: The Last Barov
5342.objective: Travel to Chillwind Camp - Alliance territory - and assassinate Weldon Barov. Take his head and return to Alexi Barov.$B$BBe warned, Weldon will probably be well protected by Alliance scum.

5343.name: Barov Family Fortune
5343.objective: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Weldon Barov when you have completed this task.

5344.name: The Last Barov
5344.objective: Travel to the Bulwark - Horde territory - and assassinate Alexi Barov. Take his head and return to Weldon Barov.$B$BBe warned, Alexi will probably be well protected by Horde filth.

5361.name: Family Tree
5361.objective: Deliver Cliffwatcher Longhorn Report to Nataka Longhorn at Ghost Walker Post in Desolace.

5381.name: Hand of Iruxos
5381.objective: Retrieve the Demon Box from Thunder Axe Fortress, and return it, along with the Demon Pick to Taiga Wisemane in Shadowprey Village.

5382.name: Doctor Theolen Krastinov, the Butcher
5382.objective: Find Doctor Theolen Krastinov inside the Scholomance. Destroy him, then burn the Remains of Eva Sarkhoff and the Remains of Lucien Sarkhoff. Return to Eva Sarkhoff when the task is complete.

5384.name: Kirtonos the Herald
5384.objective: Return to the Scholomance with the Blood of Innocents. Find the porch and place the Blood of Innocents in the brazier. Kirtonos will come to feast upon your soul.$B$BFight valiantly, do not give an inch! Destroy Kirtonos and return to Eva Sarkhoff.

5385.name: The Remains of Trey Lightforge
5385.objective: Return the Remains of Trey Lightforge to Jessir Moonbow in Felwood.

5386.name: Catch of the Day
5386.objective: Talk to Jinar'Zillen at Shadowprey Village, and then bring Nataka Longhorn 2 Bloodbelly fish.

5441.name: Lazy Peons
5441.objective: Use the Foreman's Blackjack on Lazy Peons when they're sleeping.  Wake up 5 peons, then return the Foreman's Blackjack to Foreman Thazz'ril in the Valley of Trials.

5461.name: The Human, Ras Frostwhisper
5461.objective: Travel to the Arathi Highlands, to the ruins of Stromgarde. Search Stromgarde for a Keepsake of Remembrance. If you find such an item, return with it to Magistrate Marduke.

5462.name: The Dying, Ras Frostwhisper
5462.objective: Travel to Light's Hope in Eastern Plaguelands and seek out Leonid Barthalomew the Revered. Show him the Keepsake of Remembrance and tell him all that you have discovered.

5463.name: Menethil's Gift
5463.objective: Travel to Stratholme and find Menethil's Gift. Place the Keepsake of Remembrance upon the unholy ground.

5464.name: Menethil's Gift
5464.objective: Take the Soulbound Keepsake to Leonid Barthalomew in Eastern Plaguelands.

5465.name: Soulbound Keepsake
5465.objective: Return to Magistrate Marduke in Caer Darrow. Show him the Soulbound Keepsake.

5466.name: The Lich, Ras Frostwhisper
5466.objective: Find Ras Frostwhisper in the Scholomance. When you have found him, use the Soulbound Keepsake on his undead visage. Should you succeed in reverting him to a mortal, strike him down and recover the Human Head of Ras Frostwhisper. Take the head back to Magistrate Marduke.

5481.name: Gordo's Task
5481.objective: Collect 3 Gloom Weed and deliver them to Junior Apothecary Holland in the Brill graveyard.

5482.name: Doom Weed
5482.objective: Collect 10 Doom Weed and deliver them back to Junior Apothecary Holland.

5501.name: Bone Collector
5501.objective: Bring 10 Kodo Bones from the Kodo Graveyard to Bibbly F'utzbuckle at Kormek's Hut.

5504.name: Mantles of the Dawn
5504.objective: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Hasana at the Bulwark or Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands or Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

5507.name: Mantles of the Dawn
5507.objective: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

5513.name: Mantles of the Dawn
5513.objective: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

5514.name: Mold Rhymes With...
5514.objective: Bring the Imbued Skeletal Fragments and 15 gold coins to Krinkle Goodsteel in Gadgetzan.

5515.name: Krastinov's Bag of Horrors
5515.objective: Locate Jandice Barov in the Scholomance and destroy her. From her corpse recover Krastinov's Bag of Horrors. Return the bag to Eva Sarkhoff.

5517.name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
5517.objective: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

5518.name: The Gordok Ogre Suit
5518.objective: Bring 4 Bolts of Runecloth, 8 Rugged Leather, 2 Rune Threads, and Ogre Tannin to Knot Thimblejack.  He is currently chained inside the Gordok wing of Dire Maul.

5521.name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
5521.objective: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

5522.name: Leonid Barthalomew
5522.objective: Bring the Frozen Eggs to Leonid Barthalomew in the Eastern Plaguelands.

5524.name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
5524.objective: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Hasana at the Bulwark or Quartermaster Lightspark at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands or Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

5526.name: Shards of the Felvine
5526.objective: Find the Felvine in Dire Maul and acquire a shard from it.  Chances are you'll only be able to procure one with the demise of Alzzin the Wildshaper.  Use the Reliquary of Purity to securely seal the shard inside, and return it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

5527.name: A Reliquary of Purity
5527.objective: Travel to Silithus and search for a Reliquary of Purity within the ruins of Southwind Village.  If you are able to find it, return with it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

5529.name: Plagued Hatchlings
5529.objective: Kill 20 Plagued Hatchlings, then return to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel.

5531.name: Betina Bigglezink
5531.objective: Bring the Frozen Eggs to Betina Bigglezink.

5533.name: Scholomance
5533.objective: Speak with Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

5534.name: Kim'jael's "Missing" Equipment
5534.objective: Find Some Rune that the naga have in their possession in the Ruins of Eldarath and return it to Kim'jael in Azshara.

5535.name: Spiritual Unrest
5535.objective: Destroy 6 Highborne Apparitions and 6 Highborne Lichlings before returning to Loh'atu in Azshara.

5536.name: A Land Filled with Hatred
5536.objective: Kill 6 Haldarr Satyr, 2 Haldarr Tricksters, 2 Haldarr Felsworn and then return to Loh'atu on the border of Ashenvale.

5537.name: Skeletal Fragments
5537.objective: Bring 15 Skeletal Fragments to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

5538.name: Mold Rhymes With...
5538.objective: Bring the Imbued Skeletal Fragments and 15 gold coins to Krinkle Goodsteel in Gadgetzan.

5541.name: Ammo for Rumbleshot
5541.objective: Bring Rumbleshot's Ammo to Hegnar Rumbleshot in Dun Morogh.

5542.name: Demon Dogs
5542.objective: Slay 20 Plaguehound Runts, 5 Plaguehounds and 5 Frenzied Plaguehounds. Return to Tirion Fordring when the task is complete.

5543.name: Blood Tinged Skies
5543.objective: Slay 30 Plaguebats and return to Tirion Fordring.

5544.name: Carrion Grubbage
5544.objective: Seek out the Carrion Grubs and Devourers of the region. Slay them and harvest their meat. Return to Tirion Fordring when you have gathered 15 Slabs of Carrion Worm Meat.

5545.name: A Bundle of Trouble
5545.objective: Bring 8 Bundles of Wood to Raelen at the Eastvale Logging Camp.

5561.name: Kodo Roundup
5561.objective: Bring five Tamed Kodos and the Kodo Kombobulator back to Smeed Scrabblescrew at Scrabblescrew's Camp.

5581.name: Portals of the Legion
5581.objective: Banish 6 Portals at Mannoroc Coven and return to Taiga Wisemane at Shadowprey Village.

5582.name: Healthy Dragon Scale
5582.objective: Bring the Healthy Dragon Scale to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

5621.name: Garments of the Moon
5621.objective: Find Sentinel Shaya and heal her wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant her Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Laurna Morninglight in Dolanaar.

5622.name: In Favor of Elune
5622.objective: Speak to Laurna Morninglight in Teldrassil.

5623.name: In Favor of the Light
5623.objective: Speak to Priestess Josetta in Elwynn Forest.

5624.name: Garments of the Light
5624.objective: Find Guard Roberts and heal his wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant him Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Priestess Josetta in Goldshire.

5625.name: Garments of the Light
5625.objective: Find Mountaineer Dolf and heal his wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant him Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Maxan Anvol in Kharanos.

5626.name: In Favor of the Light
5626.objective: Speak to Maxan Anvol in Dun Morogh.

5628.name: Returning Home
5628.objective: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

5629.name: Returning Home
5629.objective: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

5630.name: Returning Home
5630.objective: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

5631.name: Returning Home
5631.objective: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

5632.name: Returning Home
5632.objective: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

5633.name: Returning Home
5633.objective: Speak to Priestess Alathea in Darnassus.

5634.name: Desperate Prayer
5634.objective: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

5635.name: Desperate Prayer
5635.objective: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

5636.name: Desperate Prayer
5636.objective: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

5637.name: Desperate Prayer
5637.objective: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

5638.name: Desperate Prayer
5638.objective: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

5639.name: Desperate Prayer
5639.objective: Speak to High Priestess Laurena in Stormwind.

5641.name: A Lack of Fear
5641.objective: Speak to High Priest Rohan in Ironforge.

5644.name: Devouring Plague
5644.objective: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

5645.name: A Lack of Fear
5645.objective: Speak to High Priest Rohan in Ironforge.

5646.name: Devouring Plague
5646.objective: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

5648.name: Garments of Spirituality
5648.objective: Find Grunt Kor'ja and heal her wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant her Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Tai'jin at Razor Hill.

5650.name: Garments of Darkness
5650.objective: Find Deathguard Kel and heal his wounds using Lesser Heal (Rank 2). Afterwards, grant him Power Word: Fortitude and then return to Dark Cleric Beryl in Brill.

5651.name: In Favor of Darkness
5651.objective: Speak to Dark Cleric Beryl in Tirisfal Glades.

5658.name: Touch of Weakness
5658.objective: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.

5660.name: Touch of Weakness

5679.objective: Speak to Aelthalyste in the Undercity.
