5713.objective: Protect Sentinel Aynasha, then speak with Onaeya at Maestra's Post in Ashenvale.

5721.name: The Battle of Darrowshire
5721.objective: Place the Relic Bundle at the Darrowshire town square.$B$BPrevent Davil Lightfire's death until the death of Horgus.$B$BPrevent Captain Redpath's death until Redpath the Corrupted appears.$B$BDefeat Redpath the Corrupted.$B$BSpeak with the spirit of Joseph Redpath when he appears at the town square, then speak with Pamela at her home.

5722.name: Searching for the Lost Satchel
5722.objective: Search Ragefire Chasm for Maur Grimtotem's corpse and search it for any items of interest.

5723.name: Testing an Enemy's Strength
5723.objective: Search Orgrimmar for Ragefire Chasm, then kill 8 Ragefire Troggs and 8 Ragefire Shaman before returning to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.

5724.name: Returning the Lost Satchel
5724.objective: Take the Grimtotem Satchel to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.

5725.name: The Power to Destroy...
5725.objective: Bring the books Spells of Shadow and Incantations from the Nether to Varimathras in Undercity.

5726.name: Hidden Enemies
5726.objective: Bring a Lieutenant's Insignia to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

5727.name: Hidden Enemies
5727.objective: Take the Lieutenant's Insignia to Neeru Fireblade and speak to him. Gauge if he believes you are a member of the Burning Blade and then return to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

5728.name: Hidden Enemies
5728.objective: Kill Bazzalan and Jergosh the Invoker before returning to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

5729.name: Hidden Enemies
5729.objective: Speak to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

5730.name: Hidden Enemies
5730.objective: Speak to Thrall in Orgrimmar and tell him what you've learned.

5741.name: Sceptre of Light
5741.objective: Get the Sceptre of Light and then return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.

5742.name: Redemption
5742.objective: Listen to what Tirion Fordring has to say.

5761.name: Slaying the Beast
5761.objective: Enter Ragefire Chasm and slay Taragaman the Hungerer, then bring his heart back to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

5762.name: Hemet Nesingwary
5762.objective: Take Kravel's Crate to Hemet Nesingwary in Stranglethorn.

5763.name: Hunting in Stranglethorn
5763.objective: Bring Roon's Kodo Horn to Hemet Nesingwary in Stranglethorn.

5781.name: Of Forgotten Memories
5781.objective: Travel to the Undercroft - at the southernmost section of the Eastern Plaguelands - and recover Taelan's Hammer. Return to Tirion Fordring upon completion of your objective.

5801.name: Fire Plume Forged
5801.objective: Take the Skeleton Key Mold and 2 Thorium Bars to the top of Fire Plume Ridge in Un'Goro Crater.  Use the Skeleton Key Mold by the lava lake to forge the Unfinished Skeleton Key.$B$BBring the Unfinished Skeleton Key to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

5802.name: Fire Plume Forged
5802.objective: Take the Skeleton Key Mold and 2 Thorium Bars to the top of Fire Plume Ridge in Un'Goro Crater.  Use the Skeleton Key Mold by the lava lake to forge the Unfinished Skeleton Key.$B$BBring the Unfinished Skeleton Key to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5803.name: Araj's Scarab
5803.objective: Destroy Araj the Summoner and bring Araj's Scarab to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

5804.name: Araj's Scarab
5804.objective: Destroy Araj the Summoner and bring Araj's Scarab to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

5805.name: Welcome!
5805.objective: Bring the Northshire Gift Voucher to Merissa Stilwell.

5821.name: Bodyguard for Hire
5821.objective: Escort the Gizelton Caravan past the Kolkar Centaur village. Talk with Smeed at Scrabblescrew's Camp for your reward.

5841.name: Welcome!
5841.objective: Bring the Coldridge Valley Gift Voucher to Yori Crackhelm.

5842.name: Welcome!
5842.objective: Bring the Shadowglen Gift Voucher to Orenthil Whisperwind.

5843.name: Welcome!
5843.objective: Bring the Valley of Trials Gift Voucher to Magga.

5844.name: Welcome!
5844.objective: Bring the Camp Narache Gift Voucher to Vorn Skyseer.

5845.name: Of Lost Honor
5845.objective: Travel to Northdale, in the northeastern region of the Eastern Plaguelands, and recover the Symbol of Lost Honor. Return to Tirion Fordring upon completion of your objective.

5846.name: Of Love and Family
5846.objective: Travel to island of Caer Darrow, in the south-central region of the Plaguelands, and look for any clues as to the whereabouts of the painting.

5847.name: Welcome!
5847.objective: Bring the Deathknell Gift Voucher to Claire Willower in Deathknell.

5848.name: Of Love and Family
5848.objective: Travel to Stratholme, in the northern part of the Plaguelands. It is in the Scarlet Bastion that you will find the painting 'Of Love and Family,' hidden behind another painting depicting the twin moons of our world.$B$BReturn the painting to Tirion Fordring.

5861.name: Find Myranda
5861.objective: Travel to Uther's Tomb, located in the southern Plaguelands. Show Myranda the Hag Tirion's Gift.

5862.name: Scarlet Subterfuge
5862.objective: Speak to Myranda to gain the Scarlet Illusion. Travel to Hearthglen while under the Scarlet Illusion and deliver Tirion's Gift to Highlord Taelan Fordring.$B$BHearthglen is to the north, Taelan should be inside of Mardenholde Keep.

5863.name: The Dunemaul Compound
5863.objective: Andi Lynn in Gadgetzan wants you to destroy the Dunemaul Compound by killing 10 Dunemaul Brutes, 10 Dunemaul Enforcers, and Gor'marok the Ravager.

5881.name: Calling in the Reserves
5881.objective: Maggran wishes you to deliver a letter to Grish Longrunner at the Great Lift in the Barrens.

5892.name: Irondeep Supplies
5892.objective: Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.

5893.name: Coldtooth Supplies
5893.objective: Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Horde Quatermaster in Frostwolf Keep.

5901.name: A Plague Upon Thee
5901.objective: Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Mickey Levine at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

5902.name: A Plague Upon Thee
5902.objective: Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.

5903.name: A Plague Upon Thee
5903.objective: Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Nathaniel Dumah at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

5904.name: A Plague Upon Thee
5904.objective: Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.

5921.name: Moonglade
5921.objective: Use the spell "Teleport: Moonglade" to travel to Moonglade.  When you arrive, speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

5922.name: Moonglade
5922.objective: Use the spell "Teleport: Moonglade" to travel to Moonglade.  When you arrive, speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

5923.name: Heeding the Call
5923.objective: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

5924.objective: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

5925.objective: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

5928.name: Heeding the Call
5928.objective: Speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff.

5929.name: Great Bear Spirit
5929.objective: Seek out the Great Bear Spirit in northwestern Moonglade and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear.  When finished, return to Dendrite Starblaze in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

5930.name: Great Bear Spirit
5930.objective: Seek out the Great Bear Spirit in northwestern Moonglade and learn what it has to share with you about the nature of the bear.  When finished, return to Dendrite Starblaze in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

5931.name: Back to Darnassus
5931.objective: Return to Darnassus and speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave.

5932.name: Back to Thunder Bluff
5932.objective: Return to Thunder Bluff and speak with Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise.

5941.objective: Take the Bundle of Relics to Chromie in Andorhal.

5942.objective: Bring Joseph's Key to Joseph's Chest.

5943.objective: Escort the Gizelton Caravan through Mannoroc Coven. Talk with Smeed at Scrabblescrew's Camp for your reward.

5944.name: In Dreams
5944.objective: Escort Taelan Fordring out of Hearthglen.

5961.name: The Champion of the Banshee Queen
5961.objective: Speak with Nathanos Blightcaller in the Eastern Plaguelands. He is said to have taken up residence at the Marris Stead.

5981.name: Rampaging Giants
5981.objective: Rivern Frostwind wants you to kill 4 Frostmaul Giants and 4 Frostmaul Preservers.

6001.name: Body and Heart
6001.objective: Use the Cenarion Moondust on the Moonkin Stone of Auberdine to bring forth Lunaclaw.  From there, you must face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.$B$BSpeak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker in Darnassus when you are done.

objectivetext.1: Face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.

6002.name: Body and Heart
6002.objective: Use the Cenarion Lunardust on the Moonkin Stone between Mulgore and the Barrens to bring forth Lunaclaw.  From there, you must face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.$B$BSpeak with Turak Runetotem in Thunder Bluff when you are done.

objectivetext.1: Face Lunaclaw and earn the strength of body and heart it possesses.

6004.name: Unfinished Business
6004.objective: Kill 2 Scarlet Medics, 2 Scarlet Hunters, 2 Scarlet Magi and 2 Scarlet Knights before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

6021.name: Zaeldarr the Outcast
6021.objective: Bring Zaeldarr's Head to Caretaker Alen at Light's Hope Chapel.

6022.name: To Kill With Purpose
6022.objective: Travel to Corin's Crossing to the east and slaughter the Scourge that inhabit the town. Collect 7 pieces of Living Rot in under 10 minutes. Use the Mortar and Pestle to grind the Living Rot into Coagulated Rot.

6023.name: Unfinished Business
6023.objective: Kill Huntsman Radley and Cavalier Durgen before returning to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

6024.name: Hameya's Plea
6024.objective: Kill Infiltrator Hameya.  Use his key on the Mound of Dirt behind the Undercroft.

6025.name: Unfinished Business
6025.objective: Enter Hearthglen and find a high vantage point from which you can see the town and gauge the Scarlet Crusade's forces, then return to Kirsta Deepshadow in Western Plaguelands.

6026.name: That's Asking A Lot
6026.objective: Smokey LaRue wants you to get 2 Thorium Bars, 1 Golden Rod, 8 Hi-Explosive Bombs, and 8 Unstable Triggers.$B$BYou will have to find a blacksmith and an engineer for these items.

6027.name: Book of the Ancients
6027.objective: Get the Book of the Ancients and return it to Azore Aldamort at the tower in Ethel Rethor.

6028.name: The Everlook Report
6028.objective: Deliver the Everlook Report to Argent Officer Pureheart at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

6029.name: The Everlook Report
6029.objective: Deliver the Everlook Report to Argent Officer Garush at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

6030.name: Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff
6030.objective: Deliver the book, "Studies in Spirit Speaking", to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

6031.name: Runecloth
6031.objective: Bring 30 Runecloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.

6032.name: Sacred Cloth
6032.objective: Bring 2 Mooncloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.

6041.name: When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent
6041.objective: Travel to Plaguewood, northwest of Light's Hope. Destroy 8 Scourge Structures by using Smokey's Special Compound at the Mark of Detonation planted inside each building. Smokey has had the Ziggurats and Slaughterhouses marked.$B$BOnce you plant the bomb, leave the building and marvel at your handiwork.$B$BBy the way, Smokey's Special Compound is rather... unstable.

6042.name: Un-Life's Little Annoyances
6042.objective: Slay 20 Noxious Plaguebats and 10 Monstrous Plaguebats. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when you are finished.

6061.name: Taming the Beast
6061.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Adult Plainstrider. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

6062.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Dire Mottled Boar. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Thotar in Razor Hill.

6063.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Webwood Lurker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

6064.name: Taming the Beast
6064.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Large Crag Boar. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

6066.objective: Speak with Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

6067.objective: Speak with Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

6069.objective: Speak with Thotar at Razor Hill.

6070.objective: Speak with Thotar at Razor Hill.

6074.objective: Speak with Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

6075.objective: Speak with Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

6076.name: The Hunter's Path
6076.objective: Speak with Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

6081.name: Training the Beast
6081.objective: Speak with Ormak Grimshot in Orgrimmar.

6082.name: Taming the Beast
6082.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Armored Scorpid. Practice your skills, then return to Thotar at Razor Hill.

6083.name: Taming the Beast
6083.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Surf Crawler. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Thotar at Razor Hill.

6084.name: Taming the Beast
6084.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Snow Leopard. Practice your skills, then return to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

6085.name: Taming the Beast
6085.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Ice Claw Bear. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

6086.name: Training the Beast
6086.objective: Speak with Belia Thundergranite in Ironforge.

6087.name: Taming the Beast
6087.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Prairie Stalker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

6088.name: Taming the Beast
6088.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Swoop. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

6089.name: Training the Beast
6089.objective: Speak with Holt Thunderhorn on Hunter Rise in Thunder Bluff.

6101.name: Taming the Beast
6101.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Nightsaber Stalker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

6102.name: Taming the Beast
6102.objective: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Strigid Screecher. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

6103.name: Training the Beast
6103.objective: Speak to Jocaste in the Cenarion Enclave, in Darnassus.

6121.name: Lessons Anew
6121.objective: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

6122.name: The Principal Source
6122.objective: Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler to draw a sample of water from the mouth of the cave by the falls.$B$BDeliver the Filled Cliffspring Falls Sampler to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine, Darkshore.

6123.name: Gathering the Cure
6123.objective: Bring 5 Earthroot and 12 Lunar Funguses to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine so she may make a curative salve.

6124.name: Curing the Sick
6124.objective: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Deer that are located throughout Darkshore; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Deer have been reported starting south of the Cliffspring River to the north of Auberdine and extending all the way into southern Darkshore where the edge of Ashenvale begins.

6125.name: Power over Poison
6125.objective: Return to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

6126.name: Lessons Anew
6126.objective: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

6127.name: The Principal Source
6127.objective: Use the Empty Dreadmist Peak Sampler to draw a sample of water from a pool at the top of the peak.$B$BDeliver the Filled Dreadmist Peak Sampler to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads, Barrens.

6128.name: Gathering the Cure
6128.objective: Bring 5 Earthroot and 5 Kodo Horns to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads so he may make a curative salve.

6129.name: Curing the Sick
6129.objective: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Gazelles that are located throughout the northern part of the Barrens; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Gazelles have been reported north of the east-west road that runs through the Crossroads.

6130.name: Power over Poison
6130.objective: Return to Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise, Thunder Bluff.

6132.name: Get Me Out of Here!
6132.objective: Escort Melizza Brimbuzzle, then speak with Hornizz Brimbuzzle at the Kodo Graveyard in Desolace.

6133.name: The Ranger Lord's Behest
6133.objective: Travel to the northern borders of the Eastern Plaguelands and recover the Quel'Thalas Registry. The item is somewhere in the Quel'Lithien lodge.$B$BYou must also slay 8 Rangers, 8 Pathstriders, and 8 Woodsmen.

6134.name: Ghost-o-plasm Round Up
6134.objective: Bring 8 Ghost-o-plasms and the Crate of Ghost Magnets to Hornizz Brimbuzzle in Desolace.

6135.name: Duskwing, Oh How I Hate Thee...
6135.objective: Find Duskwing and slay him. From the corpse, recover a Patch of Duskwing's Fur and return it to Nathanos Blightcaller.$B$BIt is said that Duskwing roams the countryside to the north of Marris Stead.

6136.name: The Corpulent One
6136.objective: Find Borelgore in the northern wastes of Eastern Plaguelands and destroy him. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when the mission is complete.

6141.name: Brother Anton
6141.objective: Speak with Brother Anton in Desolace.

6142.name: Clam Bait
6142.objective: Find 10 pieces of Soft-shelled Clam Meat and bring it back to Mai'Lahii at Shadowprey Village.

6143.name: Other Fish to Fry
6143.objective: Slay 7 Slitherblade Myrmidon, 7 Slitherblade Naga, and 5 Slitherblade Sorceresses, and then talk to Drulzegar at Shadowprey in Desolace.

6144.name: The Call to Command
6144.objective: Travel to the Undercity and speak with Varimathras.

6145.name: The Crimson Courier
6145.objective: Return to Eastern Plaguelands and track down the Crimson Courier. Kill the Courier and recover the Grand Crusader's Command.$B$BTake the command to Nathanos Blightcaller for further instruction.

6146.name: Nathanos' Ruse
6146.objective: Travel to Tyr's Hand, southeast of the Marris Stead. Once there, take a bite of the Rotten Apple. While under the guise of the Scarlet Crusade, deliver the Grand Crusader's Command to Crusader Lord Valdelmar.

6147.name: Return to Nathanos
6147.objective: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller with the new information.

6148.name: The Scarlet Oracle, Demetria
6148.objective: The Scarlet Crusade is on the move. Somewhere along the road from Tyr's Hand to Stratholme you will find the Oracle, Demetria, and her entourage. Hunt her down and slay her. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller should you succeed.

6161.name: Claim Rackmore's Treasure!
6161.objective: Find Rackmore's Silver Key.  Find Rackmore's Golden Key.  Find and open Rackmore's Chest.

6162.name: A Husband's Last Battle
6162.objective: Kill Overlord Ror and return his claw to Dreka'Sur at Bloodvenom Post in Felwood.

6163.name: Ramstein
6163.objective: Travel to Stratholme and slay Ramstein the Gorger. Take his head as a souvenir for Nathanos.

6164.name: Augustus' Receipt Book
6164.objective: Bring Augustus' Receipt Book to Augustus the Touched in Terrordale.

6181.name: A Swift Message
6181.objective: Bring Lewis' Note to Thor the gryphon master.

6182.name: The First and the Last
6182.objective: Speak with Mathias Shaw in Old Town Stormwind. He resides in the Barracks.

6183.name: Honor the Dead
6183.objective: Speak with Mathias Shaw again if you wish to accept his task.

6184.name: Flint Shadowmore
6184.objective: Travel to Chillwind Camp in the Western Plaguelands and meet up with your contact, Flint Shadowmore.

6185.name: The Eastern Plagues
6185.objective: Scour the Eastern Plaguelands for clues as to the "Blightcaller" and the missing SI:7 agents. If you find any SI:7 Insignias, return them to Flint Shadowmore at Chillwind Camp.

6186.name: The Blightcaller Cometh
6186.objective: Return to Stormwind and inform Highlord Bolvar Fordragon of the fate of Nathanos Marris.

6187.name: Order Must Be Restored
6187.objective: Assemble an army and travel to the Eastern Plaguelands. Launch a full assault on Nathanos Blightcaller and any Horde filth that may attempt to protect him.$B$BKeep your wits about you, $N. The Horde will defend the ranger lord with their very lives.

6131.name: Timbermaw Ally
6131.objective: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 5 Deadwood Warriors, 5 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 5 Deadwood Gardeners.

6261.name: Dungar Longdrink
6261.objective: Bring Osric's Crate to Dungar Longdrink the gryphon master.

6281.name: Continue to Stormwind
6281.objective: Buy a gryphon ride from the gryphon master Thor, then bring Lewis' Note to Osric Strang, in the shop Limited Immunity, in the Old Town of Stormwind.

6282.name: Harpies Threaten
6282.objective: Maggran Earthbinder in Sun Rock Retreat wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.

6283.name: Bloodfury Bloodline
6283.objective: Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat wishes you to slay Bloodfury Ripper and bring her remains as proof of your deed.

6284.name: Arachnophobia
6284.objective: Kill Besseleth and bring Besseleth's Fang to Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat.

6285.name: Return to Lewis
6285.objective: Buy a gryphon ride to Sentinel Hill from the gryphon master Dungar Longdrink, then take Osric's Crate to Lewis at Sentinel Hill.

6301.name: Cycle of Rebirth
6301.objective: Tammra Windfield at Sun Rock Retreat wants you to gather 10 Gaea Seeds.

6321.name: Supplying the Sepulcher
6321.objective: Bring Podrig's Order to Karos Razok.

6322.name: Michael Garrett
6322.objective: Bring Gordon's Crate to Michael Garrett.

6323.name: Ride to the Undercity
6323.objective: Buy a bat ride to the Undercity from the bat master Karos Razok, then take Podrig's Order to Gordon Wendham in the Undercity.

6324.name: Return to Podrig
6324.objective: Buy a bat ride to the Sepulcher from the bat master Michael Garrett, then bring Gordon's Crate to Deathguard Podrig in the Sepulcher.

6342.name: Flight to Auberdine
6342.objective: Ride a hippogryph to Auberdine from the hippogryph master Vesprystus, then bring Nessa's Collection to Laird.

6343.name: Return to Nessa
6343.objective: Bring Laird's Response to Nessa Shadowsong.

6361.name: A Bundle of Hides
6361.objective: Bring the Bundle of Hides to the wind rider master Devrak in the Crossroads.

6362.name: Ride to Thunder Bluff
6362.objective: Buy a wind rider to Thunder Bluff from the wind rider master Devrak, then bring the Bundle of Hides to Ahanu in Thunder Bluff.

6363.name: Tal the Wind Rider Master
6363.objective: Bring Ahanu's Leather Goods to Tal in Thunder Bluff.

6364.name: Return to Jahan
6364.objective: Buy a wind rider to the Crossroads from the wind rider master Tal, then bring Ahanu's Leather Goods to Jahan Hawkwing.

6365.name: Meats to Orgrimmar
6365.objective: Bring Zargh's Meats to Devrak in the Crossroads.

6381.name: New Life
6381.objective: Plant 10 Gaea Seeds in Gaea Dirt Mounds, and then return the remaining Enchanted Gaea Seeds to Tammra at Sun Rock Retreat.

6382.name: The Ashenvale Hunt
6382.objective: Speak with Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

6384.name: Ride to Orgrimmar
6384.objective: Buy a wind rider to Orgrimmar from the wind rider master Devrak, then bring Zargh's Meats to Gryshka in Orgrimmar.

6385.name: Doras the Wind Rider Master
6385.objective: Bring Gryshka's Letter to Doras in Orgrimmar.

6386.name: Return to the Crossroads.
6386.objective: Buy a wind rider to the Crossroads from the wind rider master Doras, then bring Gryshka's Letter to Zargh at the Crossroads.

6387.name: Honor Students
6387.objective: Bring Brock's List to Thorgrum Borrelson in Thelsamar.

6388.name: Gryth Thurden
6388.objective: Bring the Honorary Picks to Gryth Thurden in Ironforge.

6389.name: A Plague Upon Thee
6389.objective: Release the Plagueland Termites in the Northridge Lumber Mill, then return with the Barrel of Plagueland Termites to Nathaniel Dumah at Chillwind Camp in Western Plaguelands.

6390.name: A Plague Upon Thee
6390.objective: Release the Plagueland Termites in the Northridge Lumber Mill, then return with the Barrel of Plagueland Termites to Mickey Levine at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

6391.name: Ride to Ironforge
6391.objective: Buy a gryphon to Ironforge from the gryphon master Thorgrum Borrelson, then bring Brock's List to Golnir Bouldertoe in Ironforge.

6392.name: Return to Brock
6392.objective: Buy a gryphon to Thelsamar from the gryphon master Gryth Thurden, then bring the Honorary Picks to Brock Stoneseeker in Thelsamar.

6393.name: Elemental War
6393.objective: Bring 10 Incendrites to Tsunaman at Sun Rock Retreat.

6394.name: Thazz'ril's Pick
6394.objective: Bring Thazz'ril's Pick to Foreman Thazz'ril.

6395.name: Marla's Last Wish
6395.objective: Bring Samuel Fipps' Remains to Marla's Grave, then return to Novice Elreth.

6401.name: Kaya's Alive
6401.objective: Tell Tammra Windfield in Sun Rock Retreat the good news.

6402.name: Stormwind Rendezvous
6402.objective: Travel to Stormwind City and venture to the city gates. Speak with Squire Rowe so that he may let Marshal Windsor know that you have arrived.

6403.name: The Great Masquerade
6403.objective: Follow Reginald Windsor through Stormwind. Protect him from harm!

6421.name: Boulderslide Ravine
6421.objective: Explore deep into the cave at Boulderslide Ravine and bring back 10 Resonite Crystals for Mor'rogal at Sun Rock Retreat to investigate.

6441.name: Satyr Horns
6441.objective: Collect 16 Satyr Horns for Pixel in Splintertree Post.

6442.name: Naga at the Zoram Strand
6442.objective: Bring 20 Wrathtail Heads to Marukai along the Zoram Strand.

6461.name: Blood Feeders
6461.objective: Xen'zilla at Malaka'Jin needs you to kill 10 Deepmoss Creepers and 7 Deepmoss Venomspitters.

7668.name: The Darkreaver Menace
7668.objective: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth spirits you must fight.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver; defeat him.$B$BBring Darkreaver's Head to Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom, Orgrimmar.

6462.name: Troll Charm
6462.objective: Bring 8 Troll Charms to Mitsuwa at the Zoram'gar Outpost.

6481.name: Earthen Arise
6481.objective: Open the Resonite cask with the Enchanted Resonite Crystal, and then slay Goggeroc. Return to Mor'rogal with the news and Enchanted Resonite Crystal.

6482.name: Freedom to Ruul
6482.objective: Escort Ruul, then speak with Yama Snowhoof in Splintertree Post.

6501.name: The Dragon's Eye
6501.objective: You must search the world for a being capable of restoring the power to the Fragment of the Dragon's Eye. The only information you possess about such a being is that they exist.

6502.name: Drakefire Amulet
6502.objective: You must retrieve the Blood of the Black Dragon Champion from General Drakkisath. Drakkisath can be found in his throne room behind the Halls of Ascension in Blackrock Spire.
gather: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion

6503.name: Ashenvale Outrunners
6503.objective: Kill 9 Ashenvale Outrunners, then return to Kuray'bin at Splintertree Outpost.

6504.name: The Lost Pages
6504.objective: Find the 12 missing pages of the Shredder Operating Manual, and put them together to form Chapters 1, 2, and 3. Return the pages to Gurda Ragescar near Splintertree Post.

6521.name: An Unholy Alliance
6521.objective: Bring Ambassador Malcin's Head to Varimathras in the Undercity.

6522.name: An Unholy Alliance
6522.objective: Take the Small Scroll to Varimathras in the Undercity.

6523.name: Protect Kaya
6523.objective: Escort Kaya Flathoof to Camp Aparaje, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

6541.name: Report to Kadrak
6541.objective: Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.

6542.name: Report to Kadrak
6542.objective: Report to Kadrak at the watch tower in northern Barrens.

6543.name: The Warsong Reports
6543.objective: Open the Bundle of Reports.  Take the Warsong Reports to the Warsong Scout, Warsong Runner, and Warsong Outrider. Bring back the updates they give you to Kadrak at the northern watch tower in the barrens.

6544.name: Torek's Assault
6544.objective: Escort Torek on his attack against Silverwing Outpost and Duriel Moonfire, then report to Ertog Ragetusk at Splintertree Post.

6548.name: Avenge My Village
6548.objective: Kill 8 Grimtotem Ruffians and 6 Grimtotem Mercenaries, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

6561.name: Blackfathom Villainy
6561.objective: Bring the head of Twilight Lord Kelris to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

6562.name: Trouble in the Deeps
6562.objective: Speak to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

6563.name: The Essence of Aku'Mai
6563.objective: Bring 20 Sapphires of Aku'Mai to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

6564.name: Allegiance to the Old Gods
6564.objective: Bring the Damp Note to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

6565.name: Allegiance to the Old Gods
6565.objective: Kill Lorgus Jett in Blackfathom Deeps and then return to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

6567.name: The Champion of the Horde
6567.objective: Seek out Rexxar. The Warchief has instructed you as to his whereabouts. Search the paths of Desolace, between the Stonetalon Mountains and Feralas.

6568.name: The Testament of Rexxar
6568.objective: Deliver Rexxar's Testament to Myranda the Hag in the Western Plaguelands.

6569.name: Oculus Illusions
6569.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 20 Black Dragonspawn Eyes. Return to Myranda the Hag when the task is complete.

6570.name: Emberstrife
6570.objective: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh and seek out Emberstrife's Den. Once inside, wear the Amulet of Draconic Subversion and speak with Emberstrife.

6571.name: Warsong Supplies
6571.objective: Collect the Warsong Supplies: Warsong Saw Blades, Logging Rope, Warsong Oil, and the Warsong Axe Shipment for Locke Okarr in Splintertree Post.

6582.name: The Test of Skulls, Scryer
6582.objective: You must find the blue dragonflight drake champion, Scryer, and slay him. Pry his skull from his corpse and return it to Emberstrife.$B$BYou know that Scryer can be found in Winterspring.

6583.name: The Test of Skulls, Somnus
6583.objective: Destroy the drake champion of the Green Flight, Somnus. Take his skull and return it to Emberstrife.

6584.name: The Test of Skulls, Chronalis
6584.objective: Guarding the Caverns of Time in the Tanaris Desert is Chronalis, child of Nozdormu. Destroy him and return his skull to Emberstrife.

6585.name: The Test of Skulls, Axtroz
6585.objective: Travel to Grim Batol and track down Axtroz, drake champion of the Red Flight. Destroy him and take his skull. Return the skull to Emberstrife.

6601.name: Ascension...
6601.objective: It would appear as if the charade is over. You know that the Amulet of Draconic Subversion that Myranda the Hag created for you will not function inside Blackrock Spire. Perhaps you should find Rexxar and explain your predicament. Show him the Dull Drakefire Amulet. Hopefully he will know what to do next.

6602.name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion
6602.objective: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay General Drakkisath. Gather his blood and return it to Rexxar.
gather: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion

6603.name: Trouble in Winterspring!
6603.objective: Find Donova Snowden near the hot springs in Winterspring.

6604.name: Enraged Wildkin
6604.objective: Speak with Jaron Stoneshaper at Starfall Village.

6605.name: A Strange One
6605.objective: Speak with Winna Hazzard in Felwood.

6606.name: A Little Luck
6606.objective: Speak with Witch Doctor Mau'ari in Everlook.

6607.name: Nat Pagle, Angler Extreme
6607.objective: Nat Pagle wants you to catch the following fish:$B$BMisty Reed Mahi Mahi from the Misty Reed Strand in the Swamp of Sorrows.$B$BA Sar'theris Striker from the Sar'theris Strand in Desolace.$B$BFeralas Ahi from the Verdantis River of Feralas.$B$BSavage Coast Blue Sailfin from the Savage Coast of Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BReturn to Nat Pagle when you have reeled them all in!

6608.name: You Too Good!
6608.objective: You think Lumak is trying to tell you that he can no longer help you improve your fishing skill. You may want to try to find his friend, Nat Pagle, a human fishing off one of the islands south of Theramore (at least that's what you think Lumak said).

6609.name: I Got Nothin' Left!
6609.objective: Travel to Kalimdor, to the coastal city of Theramore. From there you must search for an island, south of the main town. Nat Pagle awaits your arrival!

6610.name: Clamlette Surprise
6610.objective: Dirge Quikcleave wants you to get the following items:$B$B12 Giant Eggs. You will find those on the Rocs wandering Tanaris or any other species of large bird.$B$B10 pieces of Zesty Clam Meat. You can find those in clams, naturally!$B$B20 pieces of Alterac Swiss. Get thee to a cheesery!$B$BGather all of the items and return to Dirge.

6611.name: To Gadgetzan You Go!
6611.objective: Travel to Gadgetzan in the Tanaris desert and speak with Dirge Quikcleave about advancing your cooking career.

6612.name: I Know A Guy...
6612.objective: Travel to Gadgetzan in the Tanaris desert and speak with Dirge Quikcleave about advancing your cooking career.

6621.name: King of the Foulweald
6621.objective: Place Karang's Banner on the Foulweald Totem Mound.  Do not let the furbolgs destroy the banner.  Defeat Chief Murgut and bring Murgut's Totem to Karang Amakkar at Zoram'gar.

6625.name: Alliance Trauma
6625.objective: Travel to Theramore in the Dustwallow Marsh and speak with Doctor Gustaf VanHowzen about joining the ranks of Alliance Trauma.

6624.name: Triage
6624.objective: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

6623.name: Horde Trauma
6623.objective: Travel to Hammerfall in the Arathi Highlands and speak with Doctor Gregory Victor about joining the ranks of Horde Trauma.

6622.name: Triage
6622.objective: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

6626.name: A Host of Evil
6626.objective: Kill 8 Razorfen Battleguard, 8 Razorfen Thornweavers, and 8 Death's Head Cultists and return to Myriam Moonsinger near the entrance to Razorfen Downs.

6627.name: Test of Lore
6627.objective: Answer Braug Dimspirit's question successfully and then speak to him again. He will remain in Stonetalon Mountains when you are ready.

6628.name: Test of Lore
6628.objective: Answer Parqual Fintallas' question successfully and then speak to him again. He will remain in the Undercity until you are ready.

6629.name: Kill Grundig Darkcloud
6629.objective: Kill Grundig Darkcloud and 6 Grimtotem Brutes, and return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

6641.name: Vorsha the Lasher
6641.objective: Keep Muglash safe as he travels to the brazier. Help him by putting the brazier out, then protect him as you fight against the Naga.$B$BIf you are successful, return to the Zoram'gar Outpost and inform the Warsong Runner of the death of Vorsha the Lasher.

6642.name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Dark Iron Ore

6643.name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Fiery Core

6644.name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Lava Core

6645.name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Core Leather

6646.name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Blood of the Mountain

6661.name: Deeprun Rat Roundup
6661.objective: Capture 5 Deeprun Rats by using the Rat Catcher's Flute. Lead the rats back to Monty. Don't forget to turn in the flute when you're finished.

6662.name: Me Brother, Nipsy
6662.objective: Take the Carton of Mystery Meat to Nipsy at the Stormwind Deeprun Tram Depot.

6681.name: The Manor, Ravenholdt
6681.objective: Take the Seal of Ravenholdt to Fahrad at Ravenholdt Manor, hidden away in the hills of Hillsbrad.$B$BYour cunning will be tested along the way. Be prepared.

6761.name: The New Frontier
6761.objective: Speak with Mathrengyl Bearwalker at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus.

6762.name: Rabine Saturna
6762.objective: Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.  Moonglade lies between Felwood and Winterspring, accessible through a path out of Timbermaw Hold.

6804.name: Poisoned Water
6804.objective: Use the Aspect of Neptulon on poisoned elementals of Eastern Plaguelands.  Bring 12 Discordant Bracers and the Aspect of Neptulon to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

6805.name: Stormers and Rumblers
6805.objective: Kill 15 Dust Stormers and 15 Desert Rumblers and then return to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

6821.name: Eye of the Emberseer
6821.objective: Bring the Eye of the Emberseer to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

6822.name: The Molten Core
6822.objective: Kill 1 Fire Lord, 1 Molten Giant, 1 Ancient Core Hound and 1 Lava Surger, then return to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

6823.name: Agent of Hydraxis
6823.objective: Earn an Honored faction with the Hydraxian Waterlords, then talk to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

6824.name: Hands of the Enemy
6824.objective: Bring the Hands of Lucifron, Sulfuron, Gehennas and Shazzrah to Duke Hydraxis in Azshara.

6844.name: Umber, Archivist
6844.objective: Take the Encrusted Silithid Object to Umber - the Cenarion Circle's archivist - in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

6845.name: Uncovering Past Secrets
6845.objective: Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

6847.name: Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye
6847.objective: Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!

6848.name: Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye
6848.objective: Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!

6921.name: Amongst the Ruins
6921.objective: Bring the Fathom Core to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

6922.name: Baron Aquanis
6922.objective: Bring the Strange Water Globe to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

6961.name: Great-father Winter is Here!
6961.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

6962.name: Treats for Great-father Winter
6962.objective: Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Orgrimmar.

6963.name: Stolen Winter Veil Treats
6963.objective: Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

6964.name: The Reason for the Season
6964.objective: Speak with Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom of Orgrimmar about the Feast of Winter Veil.

6981.name: The Glowing Shard
6981.objective: Travel to Ratchet to find someone that can tell you more about the glowing shard.$B$BThen, deliver the shard as you are directed.

6982.name: Coldtooth Supplies
6982.objective: Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.

6983.name: You're a Mean One...
6983.objective: Locate and return the Stolen Treats to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar.  It was last thought to be in the possession of the Abominable Greench, found somewhere in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

6984.name: A Smokywood Pastures Thank You!
6984.objective: Speak with Great-father Winter in Orgrimmar.

6985.name: Irondeep Supplies
6985.objective: Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Horde Quartermaster in Frostwolf Keep.

7001.name: Empty Stables
7001.objective: Locate a Frostwolf in Alterac Valley. Use the Frostwolf Muzzle when you are near the Frostwolf to 'tame' the beast. Once tamed, the Frostwolf will follow you back to the Frostwolf Stable Master. Speak with the Frostwolf Stable Master to earn credit for the capture.

7003.name: Zapped Giants
7003.objective: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 15 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.

7021.name: Great-father Winter is Here!
7021.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

7022.name: Greatfather Winter is Here!
7022.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

7023.name: Greatfather Winter is Here!
7023.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

7024.name: Great-father Winter is Here!
7024.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

7025.name: Treats for Greatfather Winter
7025.objective: Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

7027.name: Empty Stables
7027.objective: Locate an Alterac Ram in Alterac Valley. Use the Stormpike Training Collar when you are near the Alterac Ram to 'tame' the beast. Once tamed, the Alterac Ram will follow you back to the Stable Master. Speak with the Stable Master to earn credit for the capture.

7028.name: Twisted Evils
7028.objective: Collect 15 Theradric Crystal Carvings for Willow in Desolace.

7029.name: Vyletongue Corruption
7029.objective: Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Vark Battlescar in Shadowprey Village.

7041.name: Vyletongue Corruption
7041.objective: Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Talendria in Nijel's Point.

7042.name: Stolen Winter Veil Treats
7042.objective: Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

7043.name: You're a Mean One...
7043.objective: Locate and return the Stolen Treats to Wulmort Jinglepocket in Ironforge.  It was last thought to be in the possession of the Abominable Greench, found somewhere in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

7044.name: Legends of Maraudon
7044.objective: Recover the two parts of the Scepter of Celebras: the Celebrian Rod and the Celebrian Diamond.$B$BFind a way to speak with Celebras.

7045.name: A Smokywood Pastures Thank You!
7045.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

7046.name: The Scepter of Celebras
7046.objective: Assist Celebras the Redeemed while he creates the Scepter of Celebras.$B$BSpeak with him when the ritual is complete.

7061.name: The Feast of Winter Veil
7061.objective: Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.

7062.name: The Reason for the Season
7062.objective: Speak with Historian Karnik at the Explorer's League in Ironforge about the Feast of Winter Veil.

7063.name: The Feast of Winter Veil
7063.objective: Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.

7064.name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
7064.objective: Slay Princess Theradras and return to Selendra near Shadowprey Village in Desolace.

7065.name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
7065.objective: Slay Princess Theradras and return to Keeper Marandis at Nijel's Point in Desolace.

7066.name: Seed of Life
7066.objective: Seek out Remulos in Moonglade and give him the Seed of Life.

7067.name: The Pariah's Instructions
7067.objective: Read the Pariah's Instructions. Afterwards, obtain the Amulet of Union from Maraudon and return it to the Centaur Pariah in southern Desolace.

7068.name: Shadowshard Fragments
7068.objective: Collect 10 Shadowshard Fragments from Maraudon and return them to Uthel'nay in Orgrimmar.

7070.name: Shadowshard Fragments
7070.objective: Collect 10 Shadowshard Fragments from Maraudon and return them to Archmage Tervosh in Theramore on the coast of Dustwallow Marsh.

7081.name: Alterac Valley Graveyards
7081.objective: Assault a graveyard, then return to Sergeant Durgen Stormpike in the Alterac Mountains.

7082.name: The Graveyards of Alterac
7082.objective: Assault a graveyard, then return to Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl in the Alterac Mountains.

7101.name: Towers and Bunkers
7101.objective: Capture an enemy tower, then return to Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl in the Alterac Mountains.

7102.name: Towers and Bunkers
7102.objective: Destroy the banner at an enemy tower or bunker, then return to Sergeant Durgen Stormpike in the Alterac Mountains.

7122.name: Capture a Mine
7122.objective: Capture a mine that the Stormpike does not control, then return to Sergeant Durgen Stormpike in the Alterac Mountains.

7124.name: Capture a Mine
7124.objective: Capture a mine, then return to Corporal Teeka Bloodsnarl in the Alterac Mountains.

7141.name: The Battle of Alterac
7141.objective: Enter Alterac Valley, defeat the Horde general Drek'thar, and then return to Prospector Stonehewer in the Alterac Mountains.

7142.name: The Battle for Alterac
7142.objective: Enter Alterac Valley and defeat the dwarven general, Vanndar Stormpike.  Then, return to Voggah Deathgrip in the Alterac Mountains.

8426.name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
8426.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

8407.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8407.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8408.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8408.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8406.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8406.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8405.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8405.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8404.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8404.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8403.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8403.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8402.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8402.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8401.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8401.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

7201.name: The Last Element
7201.objective: Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 10 Essence of the Elements. Your first inclination is to search the golems and golem makers. You remember Vivian Lagrave also muttering something about elementals.

8400.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8400.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

7223.name: Armor Scraps
7223.objective: Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Murgot Deepforge in Dun Baldar.

7224.name: Enemy Booty
7224.objective: Bring 20 Armor Scraps to Smith Regzar in Frostwolf Village.

7241.name: In Defense of Frostwolf
7241.objective: Venture to Alterac Valley, located in the Alterac Mountains. Find and speak with Warmaster Laggrond - who stands outside the tunnel entrance - to begin your career as a soldier of Frostwolf. You will find Alterac Valley north of Tarren Mill at the base of the Alterac Mountains.

7261.name: The Sovereign Imperative
7261.objective: Travel to Alterac Valley in the Hillsbrad Foothills. Outside of the entrance tunnel, find and speak with Lieutenant Haggerdin.$B$BFor the glory of Bronzebeard!

7281.name: Brotherly Love
7281.objective: Travel into Stormpike territory and slay Commander Karl Philips. Return to Commander Louis Philips when the task is complete.

7282.name: Brotherly Love
7282.objective: Travel into Frostwolf territory and slay Commander Louis Philips. Return to Commander Karl Philips when the task is complete.

7301.name: Fallen Sky Lords
7301.objective: Travel to Frostwolf territory and search for Wing Commander Slidore, Wing Commander Vipore, and Wing Commander Ichman. Return to Commander Duffy should you complete your mission.

7302.name: Fallen Sky Lords
7302.objective: Find out what became of Wing Commander Guse, Wing Commander Jeztor, and Wing Commander Mulverick. Return to Commander Mulfort should you complete your mission.

7321.name: Soothing Turtle Bisque
7321.objective: Bring 10 pieces of Turtle Meat and some Soothing Spices to Christoph Jeffcoat in Tarren Mill.

7361.name: Favor Amongst the Darkspear
7361.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing night elf players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a night elf and return to Najak Hexxen at Frostwolf Keep with a Severed Night Elf Head.

7362.name: Ally of the Tauren
7362.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing gnome players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a gnome and return to Ravak Grimtotem at Frostwolf Keep with a Tuft of Gnome Hair.

7363.name: The Human Condition
7363.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing human players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a human and return to Commander Louis Philips (who wanders between the front lines and Frostwolf keep) with a  Human Bone Chip.$B$BA cure for the human condition is close at hand!

7364.name: Gnomeregan Bounty
7364.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing tauren players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a tauren and return to Dirk Swindle at Dun'Baldar with a  Tauren Hoof.

7365.name: Staghelm's Requiem
7365.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing troll players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a troll and return to Athramanis at Dun'Baldar with Darkspear Troll Mojo.

7366.name: The Archbishop's Mercy
7366.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Forsaken players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a Forsaken and return to Commander Karl Philips (who wanders between the lumber mill and the mine) with a Forsaken Heart.

7367.name: Defusing the Threat
7367.objective: Find the Frostwolf Explosives Expert and kill him. Return to the Stormpike Explosives Expert when the task is complete.

7368.name: Defusing the Threat
7368.objective: Find the Stormpike Explosives Expert and kill him. Return to the Frostwolf Explosives Expert when the task is complete.

8399.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8399.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8398.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8398.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

7401.name: Wanted: DWARVES!
7401.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Dwarf players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a Dwarf and rip out their spine. Take the Dwarf Spine to Sergeant Yazra Bloodsnarl at Frostwolf Keep.

7402.name: Wanted: ORCS!
7402.objective: You have been tasked with slaying opposing Orc players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill an Orc and take their Orc Tooth back to Corporal Noreg Stormpike at Dun Baldar.

7423.name: I've Got A Fever For More Bone Chips

7441.name: Pusillin and the Elder Azj'Tordin
7441.objective: Travel to Dire Maul and locate the Imp, Pusillin. Convince Pusillin to give you Azj'Tordin's Book of Incantations through any means necessary.$B$BReturn to Azj'Tordin at the Lariss Pavilion in Feralas should you recover the Book of Incantations.

7461.name: The Madness Within
7461.objective: You must destroy the guardians surrounding the 5 Pylons that power the Prison of Immol'thar. Once the Pylons have powered down, the force field surrounding Immol'thar will have dissipated.$B$BEnter the Prison of Immol'thar and eradicate the foul demon that stands at its heart. Finally, confront Prince Tortheldrin in Athenaeum.$B$BReturn to the Shen'dralar Ancient in the courtyard should you complete this quest.

7462.name: The Treasure of the Shen'dralar
7462.objective: Return to the Athenaeum and find the Treasure of the Shen'dralar. Claim your reward!

7463.name: Arcane Refreshment
7463.objective: Travel to the Warpwood Quarter of Dire Maul and slay the water elemental, Hydrospawn. Return to Lorekeeper Lydros in the Athenaeum with the Hydrospawn Essence.

7481.name: Elven Legends
7481.objective: Search Dire Maul for Kariel Winthalus. Report back to Sage Korolusk at Camp Mojache with whatever information that you may find.

7482.name: Elven Legends
7482.objective: Search Dire Maul for Kariel Winthalus. Report back to Scholar Runethorn at Feathermoon with whatever information that you may find.

7483.name: Libram of Rapidity
7483.objective: Bring a Libram of Rapidity, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 2 Large Brilliant Shards, and 2 Blood of Heroes to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Rapidity.

7484.name: Libram of Focus
7484.objective: Bring a Libram of Focus, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 4 Large Brilliant Shards, and 2 Skin of Shadow to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Focus.

7485.name: Libram of Protection
7485.objective: Bring a Libram of Protection, 1 Pristine Black Diamond, 2 Large Brilliant Shards, and 1 Frayed Abomination Stitching to Lorekeeper Lydros in Dire Maul to receive an Arcanum of Protection.

7486.name: A Hero's Reward
7486.objective: Claim your reward from Hydraxis' Coffer.

7487.name: Attunement to the Core
7487.objective: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.

7488.name: Lethtendris's Web
7488.objective: Bring Lethtendris' Web to Latronicus Moonspear at the Feathermoon Stronghold in Feralas.

7489.name: Lethtendris's Web
7489.objective: Bring Lethtendris's Web to Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas.

7490.name: Victory for the Horde
7490.objective: Take the Head of Onyxia to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

7491.name: For All To See
7491.objective: Seek out Overlord Runthak in the Valley of Strength.

7492.name: Camp Mojache
7492.objective: Speak with Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas.

7494.name: Feathermoon Stronghold
7494.objective: Speak with Latronicus Moonspear at the Feathermoon Stronghold in Feralas.

7495.name: Victory for the Alliance
7495.objective: Take the Head of Onyxia to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Stormwind.

7496.name: Celebrating Good Times
7496.objective: Seek out Major Mattingly in the Valley of Heroes.

7506.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7501.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7500.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7498.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7507.name: Foror's Compendium
7507.objective: Return Foror's Compendium of Dragon Slaying to the Athenaeum.

7508.objective: Give the Dull and Flat Elven Blade to Lorekeeper Lydros.
source: A Dull and Flat Elven Blade
gather: A Dull and Flat Elven Blade

7509.name: The Forging of Quel'Serrar
7509.objective: You must get Onyxia to breathe fire on the Unfired Ancient Blade. Once this is done, pick up the now Heated Ancient Blade. Be warned, a Heated Ancient Blade will not remain heated forever - time is of the essence.$B$BThe last step before returning to me is to slay the beast and drive the Heated Ancient Blade into her corpse.$B$BDo this and Quel'Serrar will be yours.

7521.name: Thunderaan the Windseeker
7521.objective: To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Wind Seeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian.

7562.name: Mor'zul Bloodbringer
7562.objective: Speak with Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.

7563.name: Rage of Blood
7563.objective: Bring 30 bottles of Raging Beast's Blood to Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.

7564.name: Wildeyes
7564.objective: Bring the Case of Blood to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

7581.name: The Prison's Bindings
7581.objective: Travel to Dire Maul in Feralas and recover 15 Satyr Blood from the Wildspawn Satyr that inhabit the Warpwood Quarter. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when this is done.

7582.name: The Prison's Casing
7582.objective: Travel to Darkwhisper Gorge in Winterspring and recover 5 Tears of the Hederine from the Hederine demons that occupy the gorge. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when you have completed this task.

7583.name: Suppression
7583.objective: Venture forth into the Tainted Scar and locate a Doomguard Commander.$B$BUse the Glowing Crystal Prison on the Doomguard Commander. Be prepared for a ferocious onslaught of attacks, as the demon attempts to escape capture.$B$BShould you succeed, return the Imprisoned Doomguard to Daio in the Tainted Scar.

7602.name: Flawless Fel Essence
7602.objective: Impsy in Felwood has asked that you bring him three Flawless Fel Essences originating from three distinct locations.$B$BThe Legashi Satyrs of Azshara hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Jaedenar Legionnaires of Jaedenar hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Felguard Sentries of the Blasted Lands hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region.$B$BRecover the Flawless Fel Essences and return  to Impsy in Felwood.

7603.name: Kroshius' Infernal Core
7603.objective: Search Shatter Scar Vale in Felwood for the remains of Kroshius. When you locate the remains, use the Fel Fire near them and await Kroshius' return. When the infernal has awoken, slay him and take from his corpse Kroshius' Infernal Core.$B$BReturn Kroshius' Infernal Core to Niby the Almighty in Felwood.

7604.name: A Binding Contract
7604.objective: Turn the Thorium Brotherhood Contract in to Lokhtos Darkbargainer if you would like to receive the plans for Sulfuron.

7622.name: The Balance of Light and Shadow
7622.objective: Save 50 Peasants before 15 are slain. Speak with Eris Havenfire should you accomplish this task.$B$BYou may view the Death Post to view how many Peasants have been slain.

7623.name: Lord Banehollow
7623.objective: Purchase Shadowy Potions from Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.$B$BUse the potions to travel through Jaedenar, and speak with Lord Banehollow.

7624.name: Ulathek the Traitor
7624.objective: Confront Ulathek, then bring The Traitor's Heart to Lord Banehollow in Jaedenar.

7625.name: Xorothian Stardust
7625.objective: Purchase Xorothian Stardust from Ur'dan.  Bring it to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

7626.name: Bell of Dethmoora
7626.objective: Bring 10 Elixirs of Shadow Power to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

7627.name: Wheel of the Black March
7627.objective: Bring 6 Large Brilliant Shards and 25 Dark Iron Ore to Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.

7628.name: Doomsday Candle
7628.objective: Bring 35 Black Dragonscales to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

7629.name: Imp Delivery
7629.objective: Bring the Imp in a Jar to the alchemy lab in the Scholomance.  After the parchment is created, return the jar to Gorzeeki Wildeyes.

7630.name: Arcanite
7630.objective: Bring 3 Arcanite Bars to Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.

7631.name: Dreadsteed of Xoroth
7631.objective: Read Mor'zul's Instructions.  Summon a Xorothian Dreadsteed, defeat it, then bind its spirit to you.

7632.name: The Ancient Leaf
7632.objective: Find the owner of the Ancient Petrified Leaf. Good luck, $N; It's a big world.

7634.name: Ancient Sinew Wrapped Lamina
7634.objective: Hastat the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Blue Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Hastat in Felwood.

7635.name: A Proper String
7635.objective: Stoma the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Black Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Stoma in Felwood.

7636.name: Stave of the Ancients
7636.objective: You must find and destroy these four demonic corrupters:$B$BSimone the Seductress.$B$BKlinfran the Crazed.$B$BSolenor the Slayer.$B$BArtorius the Doombringer.$B$BDestroy these creatures and return to Vartrus the Ancient in Felwood with their heads.$B$BRefer to the Petrified Bark in your inventory for clues as to their whereabouts.$B$BYou MUST complete this task by yourself.

7637.name: Emphasis on Sacrifice
7637.objective: Travel to Ironforge and get High Priest Rohan's Exorcism Censer.  You will need to make a donation of 150 gold in order to secure it.

7638.name: Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker
7638.objective: Speak with Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District.

7639.name: To Show Due Judgment
7639.objective: Return the Exorcism Censer to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

7640.name: Exorcising Terrordale
7640.objective: Use the Exorcism Censer to drive out the spirits that torment Terrordale.  When you have slain 25 Terrordale Spirits, return to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

7641.name: The Work of Grimand Elmore
7641.objective: Speak with Grimand Elmore in Stormwind's Dwarven District.

7642.name: Collection of Goods
7642.objective: Bring 40 Runecloth, 6 Arcanite Bars, 10 Arthas' Tears, 5 Stratholme Holy Water vials, and 150 gold to Grimand Elmore in the Dwarven District of Stormwind.

7643.name: Ancient Equine Spirit
7643.objective: Acquire special horse feed used for feeding a spirit horse.  Merideth Carlson in Southshore apparently is the source for such food.$B$BTravel to the Dire Maul dungeon in Feralas and slay Tendris Warpwood.  Doing so will free the Ancient Equine Spirit.  Feed it the special horse feed, thereby soothing the spirit.  Finally, give it the Arcanite Barding so it may bless it.

7644.name: Blessed Arcanite Barding
7644.objective: Return with the Blessed Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

7645.name: Manna-Enriched Horse Feed
7645.objective: Retrieve 20 Enriched Manna Biscuits - the key ingredient in making Manna-Enriched Horse Feed - for Merideth Carlson at Southshore in the Hillsbrad Foothills.  The Argent Dawn is known as the sole purveyor of the biscuits.$B$BYou also need to give her 50 gold to soothe her ruffled sensibilities.

7646.name: The Divination Scryer
7646.objective: Bring an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

7647.name: Judgment and Redemption
7647.objective: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth the spirits you must judge.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver.  Defeat him and reclaim the lost soul of the fallen charger.$B$BGive the Charger's Redeemed Soul and the Blessed Enchanted Barding to Darkreaver's Fallen Charger.

7648.name: Grimand's Finest Work
7648.objective: Take the Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District for his inspection.

7649.name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume I
7649.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7650.name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume II
7650.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7651.name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume III
7651.objective: Return the book to its rightful owners.

7665.name: Red Raptor Replacement
gather: Whistle of the Mottled Red Raptor

7667.name: Material Assistance
7667.objective: If you are interested in helping Sagorne Crestrider in Orgrimmar's Valley of Wisdom, bring him an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond.

7701.name: WANTED: Overseer Maltorius
7701.objective: Deep within the Slag Pit of the Cauldron, in the Searing Gorge, you will find the traitorous Dark Iron dwarf named Overseer Maltorius.$B$BSlay Overseer Maltorius and take his head. Return the head to Lookout Captain Lolo Longstriker in the Searing Gorge for your reward.

7703.name: Unfinished Gordok Business
7703.objective: Find the Gauntlet of Gordok Might and return it to Captain Kromcrush in Dire Maul.$B$BAccording to Kromcrush, the "old timey story" says that Tortheldrin - a "creepy" elf who called himself a prince - stole it from one of the Gordok kings.

7721.name: Fuel for the Zapping
7721.objective: Collect 10 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.

7722.name: What the Flux?
7722.objective: Somewhere in the Slag Pit of the Cauldron you will find the Secret Plans: Fiery Flux that Overseer Maltorius stole. Find those plans and return them to Master Smith Burninate in the Searing Gorge.

7723.name: Curse These Fat Fingers
7723.objective: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Heavy War Golems.$B$BThe Heavy War Golems wander the areas surrounding the Cauldron in the Searing Gorge. When you've killed enough, return to Hansel in Searing Gorge.

7724.name: Fiery Menace!
7724.objective: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Greater Lava Spiders in the Searing Gorge. You can find Greater Lava Spiders in the plateaus and lava pools of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Greater Lava Spiders.

7725.name: Again With the Zapped Giants
7725.objective: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 10 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.

7726.name: Refuel for the Zapping
7726.objective: Collect 6 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.

7727.name: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
7727.objective: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Incendosaurs.$B$BYou will find Incendosaurs occupying the lava pools inside the Slag Pit. The Slag Pit can be found in the Cauldron of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Incendosaurs.

7728.name: STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass
7728.objective: Find and return the Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge.$B$BThe only information you have about these items is the following: They were definitely stolen by Dark Iron dwarves. The Smithing Tuyere is a blacksmithing tool used by blacksmiths and the Lookout's Spyglass is an invaluable monitoring tool to lookouts.

7729.name: JOB OPPORTUNITY: Culling the Competition
7729.objective: Slay 15 Dark Iron Taskmasters and 15 Dark Iron Slavers. Return to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge once you have accomplished this task.

7730.name: Zukk'ash Infestation
7730.objective: Bring 20 Zukk'ash Carapaces to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

7731.name: Stinglasher
7731.objective: Defeat Stinglasher in the Writhing Deep, bringing its glands back to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

7732.name: Zukk'ash Report
7732.objective: Deliver the Camp Mojache Zukk'ash Report to Zilzibin Drumlore.  He resides in the Drag of Orgrimmar.

7733.name: Improved Quality
7733.objective: Bring 10 Rage Scar Yeti Hides to Pratt McGrubben at Feathermoon Stronghold, Feralas.

7734.name: Improved Quality
7734.objective: Bring 10 Rage Scar Yeti Hides to Jangdor Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

7735.name: Pristine Yeti Hide
7735.objective: Bring the Pristine Yeti Hide to Pratt McGrubben at the Feathermoon Stronghold, Feralas.

8241.name: Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Iron

7738.name: Perfect Yeti Hide
7738.objective: Bring the Perfect Yeti Hide to Jangdor Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

7761.name: Blackhand's Command
7761.objective: That is one stupid orc. It would appear as if you need to find this brand and gain the Mark of Drakkisath in order to access the Orb of Command.$B$BThe letter indicates that General Drakkisath guards the brand. Perhaps you should investigate.

7781.name: The Lord of Blackrock
7781.objective: Return the Head of Nefarian to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Stormwind.

7782.name: The Lord of Blackrock
7782.objective: Venture to the Valley of Heroes in Stormwind City and speak with Field Marshal Afrasiabi.

7783.name: The Lord of Blackrock
7783.objective: Return the Head of Nefarian to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

7784.name: The Lord of Blackrock
7784.objective: Speak with High Overlord Saurfang in Orgrimmar. He stands waiting for you in the Valley of Strength.

7785.name: Examine the Vessel
7785.objective: Examine the Vessel of Rebirth and return it to Highlord Demitrian.

7787.name: Rise, Thunderfury!
7787.objective: Present the Dormant Wind Kissed Blade to Highlord Demitrian.

8081.name: More Resource Crates
8081.objective: Win the battle for Arathi Basin, get an Arathi Resource Crate, and return it to Sergeant Maclear at Refuge Pointe.

8397.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8397.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8396.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8396.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8395.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8395.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8394.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8394.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8393.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8393.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8392.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8392.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

7810.name: Arena Master
7810.objective: Speak with Short John Mithril in the Stranglethorn Arena.

8391.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8391.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8390.name: Conquering Arathi Basin
8390.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Mark of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

7815.name: Snapjaws, Mon!
7815.objective: Katoom the Angler at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 15 Saltwater Snapjaw turtles. Return to him when you have completed this task.

7816.name: Gammerita, Mon!
7816.objective: Katoom the Angler at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill Gammerita and retrieve Katoom's Best Lure from her corpse.$B$BKatoom mentioned that Gammerita hangs out on the coast with the other turtles.

8389.name: Battle of Warsong Gulch
8389.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

8388.name: For Great Honor
8388.objective: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

8387.name: Invaders of Alterac Valley
8387.objective: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

8385.name: Concerted Efforts
8385.objective: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Mark of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Mark of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8386.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8386.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8384.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8384.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8383.name: Remember Alterac Valley!
8383.objective: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

7828.name: Stalking the Stalkers
7828.objective: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 10 Silvermane Stalkers and 10 Silvermane Howlers. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the wolves hide in the wilds of the Hinterlands.

7829.name: Hunt the Savages
7829.objective: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 20 Savage Owlbeasts. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the Savage Owlbeasts occupy the wilds of the Hinterlands.

7830.name: Avenging the Fallen
7830.objective: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill a Razorbeak Skylord and retrieve its Skylord Plume. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the Razorbeak Skylord are a rare breed that tend to occupy the wilds of the Hinterlands.

8375.name: Remember Alterac Valley!
8375.objective: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8374.name: Claiming Arathi Basin
8374.objective: Bring 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

8372.name: Fight for Warsong Gulch
8372.objective: Bring 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

7838.name: Arena Grandmaster
7838.objective: Avast Lubber! Bring me 12 trinkets of the Arena Master.

7839.name: Vilebranch Hooligans
7839.objective: Smith Slagtree at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Slagtree's Lost Tools. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BYou recall Smith Slagtree mentioning that the tools might be at one of the Vilebranch temples in the northeastern region of the Hinterlands. You should also check Skulk Rock.

7840.name: Lard Lost His Lunch
7840.objective: Lard at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Lard's Lunch. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BLard mentioned that he left it on the island to the north. Watch out for Vilebranch trolls.

7841.name: Message to the Wildhammer
7841.objective: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to slaughter 15 Highvale Outrunners, 15 Highvale Scouts, 15 Highvale Marksman and 15 Highvale Rangers. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BYou can find the Highvale high elves at the Quel'Danil Lodge in the northwestern region of the Hinterlands.

7842.name: Another Message to the Wildhammer
7842.objective: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to bring him 10 Long Elegant Feathers from the gryphons that inhabit the Hinterlands. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BGryphons are known to inhabit every region of the Hinterlands.

7843.name: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
7843.objective: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to travel to Aerie Peak in the western region of the Hinterlands and place the Final Message to the Wildhammer by the well in the center of town. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BBeware of angry Wildhammer dwarves and unruly members of the Alliance.

7844.name: Cannibalistic Cousins
7844.objective: Mystic Yayo'jin at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 15 Vilebranch Scalpers and 10 Vilebranch Soothsayers. Return to her when this task is complete.$B$BYayo'jin indicated that these trolls could be found near the Shaol'watha and Agol'watha temples in the north by northeastern region of the Hinterlands.

7845.name: Kidnapped Elder Torntusk!
7845.objective: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to rescue her mate, Elder Torntusk, from Jintha'alor.$B$BYou have been told that he is being held prisoner atop Jintha'alor, the Vilebranch capital city located in the southern region of the Hinterlands.

7846.name: Recover the Key!
7846.objective: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to kill Hitah'ya the Keeper to get the Shackle Key to his bindings. Return to Elder Torntusk when you have recovered the key.

7847.name: Return to Primal Torntusk
7847.objective: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village with news of his rescue.

7848.name: Attunement to the Core
7848.objective: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.

7849.name: Separation Anxiety
7849.objective: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover his twin brother's remains. Find and return Huntsman Malkhor's Skull and Huntsman Malkhor's Bones to Huntsman Markhor.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that his brother's remains were fed to the oozes and wolves of the Vilebranch. He also mentioned that there is a refuse pit filled with oozes in Jintha'alor as well as a wolf den. Both of these places are near the top of the temple.

7850.name: Dark Vessels
7850.objective: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover 10 Vessels of Tainted Blood from Jintha'alor. Return to Primal Torntusk when this task is complete.

7861.name: Wanted: Vile Priestess Hexx and Her Minions
7861.objective: You have been ordered to slay Vile Priestess Hexx and 10 Vilebranch Aman'zasi Guards. See Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands once this task is complete.$B$BVile Priestess Hexx and the Aman'zasi Guards can be found atop Jintha'alor in the Hinterlands.

7862.name: Job Opening: Guard Captain of Revantusk Village
7862.objective: You have been tasked with the decimation of 20 Vilebranch Berserkers, 20 Vilebranch Shadow Hunters, 20 Vilebranch Blood Drinkers, and 20 Vilebranch Soul Eaters.$B$BShould you complete this task, return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands.

They might have some additional work and advice for you.$B$BAnd $N, remember the Commander's words: "Do what you must..."

objectivetext.1: The Fate of Mistress Natalia Mar'alith

Should the Qiraji Emissary appear, slay it and recover the Crystal Unlocking Mechanism. Return to Geologist Larksbane if you succeed.$B$BAssemble an army for this task, $N!
