7382.name: Korrak the Everliving
7382.objective: Should Korrak the Bloodrager make a return to the Field of Strife, seek him out and destroy him.$B$BReturn the Skull of Korrak to Lieutenant Haggerdin in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

7381.name: The Return of Korrak
7381.objective: Should Korrak the Bloodrager make a return to the Field of Strife, seek him out and destroy him.$B$BReturn the Skull of Korrak to Warmaster Laggrond in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

7202.name: Korrak the Bloodrager
7202.objective: According to legend, the leader of the mighty Winterax trolls appears at will to wreak havoc on the denizens of Alterac Valley.$B$BShould Korrak make himself known, destroy him and return to Lieutenant Haggerdin in the Alterac Mountains.

7181.name: The Legend of Korrak
7181.objective: According to legend, the leader of the mighty Winterax trolls appears at will to wreak havoc on the denizens of Alterac Valley.$B$BShould Korrak make himself known, destroy him and return to Warmaster Laggrond.

8409.name: Ruined Kegs
8409.objective: Return to Darkcaller Yanka at the Wickerman Festival in Tirisfal Glade.

8410.name: Elemental Mastery
8410.objective: Collect a sample of air, fire, earth and water for Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

8411.name: Mastering the Elements
8411.objective: Bring the elements earth, air, fire and water to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

8412.name: Spirit Totem
8412.objective: Bring the pieces for the spirit totem to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

8413.name: Da Voodoo
8413.objective: Bring the voodoo feathers to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

8414.name: Dispelling Evil
8414.objective: Collect 20 Minion's Scourgestones and bring them to High Priest Thel'danis in the Western Plaguelands.

8415.name: Chillwind Point
8415.objective: Speak to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp.

8416.name: Inert Scourgestones
8416.objective: Bring the Inert Scourgestone to Commander Ashlan Valorfist in Chillwind Point.

8417.name: A Troubled Spirit
8417.objective: Speak with the Fallen Hero of the Horde at the entrance to the Blasted Lands.

8418.name: Forging the Mightstone
8418.objective: Bring the voodoo feathers to Ashlam Valorfist.

8419.objective: Bring a piece of felcloth to Impsy in Felwood.

8421.name: The Wrong Stuff
8421.objective: Bring 10 Rotting Wood and 4 Bloodvenom Essence to Impsy in Felwood.

8423.name: Warrior Kinship
8423.objective: Kill 7 Helboar in the Blasted Lands and return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

8424.objective: Slaughter the Shadowsworn in the Blasted Lands and return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

8425.objective: Bring the Voodoo Feathers from the trolls in the Sunken Temple to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

7162.name: Proving Grounds
7162.objective: Travel to the Icewing Caverns located southwest of Dun Baldar in Alterac Valley and recover the Stormpike Banner. Return the Stormpike Banner to Lieutenant Haggerdin in the Alterac Mountains.

7161.name: Proving Grounds
7161.objective: Travel to the Wildpaw cavern located southeast of the main base in Alterac Valley and find the Frostwolf Banner. Return the Frostwolf Banner to Warmaster Laggrond.

3089.name: Rune-Inscribed Parchment
3089.objective: Read the Rune-Inscribed Parchment and speak to Shikrik in the Valley of Trials.

8446.name: Shrouded in Nightmare
8446.objective: Find someone capable of deciphering the meaning behind the Nightmare Engulfed Object.$B$BPerhaps a druid of great power could assist you.

8447.name: Waking Legends
8447.objective: Wait for Keeper Remulos at the Moonglade to cleanse the Nightmare Engulfed Object.

6221.name: Deadwood of the North
6221.objective: Grazle would like you to kill 6 Deadwood Den Watchers, 6 Deadwood Avengers, and 6 Deadwood Shamans.

8462.name: Speak to Nafien
8462.objective: Travel north along the main road in Felwood and speak with the furbolg named Nafien.  He stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

8465.name: Speak to Salfa
8465.objective: Travel through Timbermaw Hold and exit into Winterspring.  Speak with Salfa, who stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

8466.name: Feathers for Grazle
8466.objective: Some of the Deadwood furbolgs wear a distinctive headdress that may be used as a means of proof in thinning their numbers. Bring me a feather from any headdresses you acquire; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

8469.name: Beads for Salfa
8469.objective: The Winterfall are known to carry spirit beads to ward against foul spirits. These beads have clearly failed in their purpose, as the Winterfall themselves are the agents of corruption. Bring to me these spirit beads from fallen Winterfall furbolgs; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

8470.name: Deadwood Ritual Totem
8470.objective: Take the Deadwood Ritual Totem inside Timbermaw Hold and see if one of the furbolgs there will find a use for the item.  The Timbermaw will not speak with you unless you are of Neutral reputation or greater with them.

8471.name: Winterfall Ritual Totem
8471.objective: Take the Winterfall Ritual Totem inside Timbermaw Hold and see if one of the furbolgs there will find a use for the item.  The Timbermaw will not speak with you unless you are of Neutral reputation or greater with them.

8481.name: The Root of All Evil
8481.objective: Plant the Demon Summoning Torch in the mouth of High Chief Winterfall's cave in the Winterfall furbolg village.  Defeat the demon and retrieve the Essence of Xandivious for Gorn One Eye in Timbermaw Hold.

8484.name: The Brokering of Peace
8484.objective: Bring the Timbermaw Offering of Peace to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.

Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers and obtain Signed Field Duty Papers from Captain Blackanvil and return to Windcaller Kaldon at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Ironforge Brigade will flag you for PvP.

8559.objective: Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of War, 5 Ivory Scarabs and 5 Gold Scarabs to Kandrostrasz in Ahn'Qiraj.  This quest also requires Neutral faction with the Brood of Nozdormu.

8578.objective: Find Narain's Scrying Goggles and return them to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

8731.name: Field Duty
8731.objective: Report to Krug Skullsplit at the Orgrimmar Legion post in front of Hive'Regal.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers, obtain Signed Field Duty Papers and bring them to Windcaller Kaldon in Cenarion Hold.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Orgrimmar Legion will flag you for PvP.

8735.name: The Nightmare's Corruption

8736.name: The Nightmare Manifests
8736.objective: Defend Nighthaven from Eranikus. Do not let Keeper Remulos perish. Do not slay Eranikus. Defend yourself. Await Tyrande.

8874.name: The Lunar Festival
8874.objective: Talk to the Lunar Festival Harbinger in the entrance to the Undercity. You can also talk to Lunar Festival Harbingers in other capital cities.

9257.name: Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
9257.objective: Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris wants you to take Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian to Stratholme and use it on Consecrated Earth. Defeat the entity that is exorcised from the staff and return to him.

8796.name: The Alliance Needs Your Help!
8796.objective: Speak with Field Marshal Snowfall in Ironforge's Military Ward.

8797.name: The Alliance Needs Your Help!
8797.objective: Speak with Field Marshal Snowfall in Ironforge's Military Ward.

8828.name: Winter's Presents
8828.objective: Speak with Greatfather Winter. He is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

8904.name: Dangerous Love
8904.objective: Get a Guardian's Moldy Card and bring it to Fenstad Argyle in the Undercity.

1739.name: The Binding
1739.objective: Using the Heartswood Core, summon and subdue a succubus, then return the Heartswood Core to Gakin the Darkbinder in the Slaughtered Lamb.

7383.name: Crown of the Earth
7383.objective: Fill the Amethyst Phial and bring it back to Corithras Moonrage in Dolanaar.

8551.name: The Captain's Chest
8551.objective: Bring Smotts' Chest to Hecklebury Smotts in Booty Bay.

5502.name: A Warden of the Horde
5502.objective: Return your ward to the Orgrimmar orphanage by handing in the Orcish Orphan Whistle to Orphan Matron Battlewail in the Valley of Honor.

8067.name: Paragons of Power: The Predator's Mantle
8067.objective: Bring the following Paragons of Power from Zul'Gurub to Falthir the Sightless: A Primal Hakkari Aegis.  You must also have a reputation equal to or greater than Revered with the Zandalar Tribe.$B$BFalthir the Sightless is located on Yojamba Isle, Stranglethorn Vale.

2478.name: Mission: Possible But Not Probable
2478.objective: Steal Silixiz's Tower Key from Foreman Silixiz, then kill two Mutated Venture Co. Drones, two Venture Co. Patrollers, and two Venture Co. Lookouts.$B$BAssassinate Grand Foreman Gallywix and take his head, then pick the lock on Gallywix's lockbox and steal the Cache of Zanzil's Altered Mixture. Take the Cache and Gallywix's Head back to Shenthul in Orgrimmar for further instruction.

8460.name: Timbermaw Ally
8460.objective: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 6 Deadwood Warriors, 6 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 6 Deadwood Gardeners.  Return to him in southern Felwood near the Emerald Sanctuary when you are done.

6241.name: Winterfall Activity
6241.objective: Salfa wants you to kill 6 Winterfall Totemics, 6 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 6 Winterfall Pathfinders.

8464.name: Winterfall Activity
8464.objective: Salfa wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Totemics, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Pathfinders.

1598.name: The Stolen Tome
1598.objective: Retrieve the Powers of the Void for Drusilla La Salle.
